jobs.title: Inbound Sales 🇫🇷
jobs.descriptionHtml:
🐼 Who we are

You. Better. With Alan.

Alan's vision is to make prevention the new norm of care for all. Our mission is to help people live in good health to 100 while helping employers feel proud, turning health benefits from a cost centre into their most valuable investment.

We're building a vertically integrated health partner that seamlessly unites insurance and smart healthcare delivery into one system.

By connecting all aspects of care - private, public, and direct to consumer - we create the most member-centric healthcare experience. Through deep engagement, we empower everyone to overcome day-to-day health obstacles and live healthier lives.

We partner with 35K+ companies of all sizes, serving more than 950K+ members, and have reached 680M+ in ARR.

Our team of 700+ people (still growing) operates across France 🇫🇷, Spain 🇪🇸, Belgium 🇧🇪, and Canada 🇨🇦.

🤘 How we do it ?

People joining Alan are often surprised and delighted by our innovative working method. We have a set of cultural values that guide our approach to work, such as:


🎯 What drives us — We're obsessed with helping our members live healthier

Mission is the Boss: long-term thinking, seeking our mission success above all else.

Member & customer-led: obsessively focused on solving members & customers problems and creating the most delightful experiences.


🏆 How we build excellence — We hire the best people and give them platform to succeed

Champions of excellence: extremely high standards and talent density.

Distributed ownership: accountable enlightened despots, everyone owns their decisions and results.

Radically transparent: all information is accessible and written-first, so everyone can make the best decisions asynchronously


🤝 How we grow together — We help each other improve through honest feedback and bold thinking

Optimistic alchemy: optimists who collaborate with genuine care and support teammates.

Empathetic challengers: direct, caring feedback combined with praises to help each other grow professionally

Bold & creative contrarians: think differently to achieve greatness, try new approaches


⚡ How we move fast — We fight complexity and focus on what matters most

Disciplined in execution: taking decisive actions with focus that compounds success over time

Fight for simplicity: only high impact processes, smart frugality

⚡ The Inbound Sales 🇫🇷 role

We're growing our Inbound Sales team in France.

Our Inbound Sales team is in charge of closing inbound requests from leads with 1 to 5 employees (Independent workers, very small companies, individuals).

You’ll be in charge of the whole sales cycle from qualification to closing by educating prospects and providing inspiring arguments to transform them into convinced customers.

At the same time, we expect you to understand, embrace and apply the Alan Smart & Soft selling method. This method stems from the concept that the prospect experience is an inseparable piece of the overall Alan customer experience. You are expected to make this experience pleasant, instructive and delightful by leveraging the most relevant messaging and materials (Smart) and by defining the high-touch strategy that suits best each prospect (Soft). 

We also expect you to look at the big picture and help us grow and improve as a company. For that, you’ll have to be real team players even beyond your role. You’ll be expected to challenge us to improve our product(s), our methods, and our strategy, and get involved in other projects and initiatives relevant to growing our customer base.

What does make this role exciting :

  • You will close deals every single day of the year, which is very stimulating!

  • The Inbound Sales team is quite recent: You will contribute to building a new practice within the Sales Community, getting involved in tooling and process improvements

  • You will help building the playbook of best practices to close deals in one shot

  • You will contribute to making our products even better by sharing feedback and improving the self-serve experience for our members

  • You will become an insurance expert and learn to master our products in order to confidently answer questions & objections from prospects

  • We invest heavily in AI to transform the Sales practice. You'll have the opportunity to become one of the most modern Sales professionals in the market!

⭐ You will be a great fit for this role if you: 

  • Have 1-2 years of experience in a Sales role including closing experience

  • Have full working proficiency in French (C2 and above), and advanced level in English

  • Are highly organized with exceptional follow-up skills

  • Show a great balance between Active Listening and Assertiveness when interacting with your prospects

  • Have natural empathy and are passionate about understanding and solving prospects' problems

  • Have a positive attitude and ability to collaborate in a small team

  • Have a desire to learn fast and make an impact from day 1

For this opportunity, we are aiming to hire within the A2-B1 level range.

Everything else is a plus. We care about having a diversity of experiences, profiles and backgrounds in our team.

🙌   Perks & Benefits

At Alan, we believe that being in good health is a basic need, and it starts with our employees. This is why Alaners are provided with a stimulating environment and perks ensuring they are happy, efficient and spend only high-quality time with co-workers. 

Therefore, we offer:

  • Fair rewards. Generous equity packages complement your base salary.

  • Flexible Office. Amazing office space at our HQ in Paris, sponsored co-working hubs in Ghent Brussels or Antwerp or a full-remote experience with home office equipment sponsorship, we want you to live where you’re the happiest.

  • All the tools you need. Top of the range equipment: Macbook Pro, keyboard, laptop stand, monitor, and Bose noise-canceling headphones.

  • Flexible vacation policy and flexible working hours. Organize your  time as you  wish.

  • Delightful healthcare insurance. Extremely comprehensive health insurance - 100% of the contribution covered by Alan for you and your family.

  • Transport. You can use your own inspiration based on the Green mobility budget (for Senior level Alaners)

  • Learning & Training opportunities. A highly  flexible Training policy free books and budget to attend and speak at conferences if the opportunity arises.

  • Parental leave. Extended parental leave for all new parents.

Important note: we hire people not roles. 

After reading this job description, if you feel like you don’t have all the necessary prerequisites but that it matches where you are now or what you'd like to grow into in your next position, we encourage you to apply!

Not everybody will enter our recruitment process, but all, no matter how underrepresented, should feel free to apply as it can only bring learnings or success.

🔖 Check out our About Alan and Career pages, as well as our Medium, blog and Glassdoor page for more info.

jobs.title: Freelance Dermatologist - France 🇫🇷
jobs.descriptionHtml:
🐻 Qui est Alan ?

Alan est une assurance santé qui met l'accent sur la prévention et l'accès aux meilleurs soins pour tous. Nous avons donc créé une clinique virtuelle qui regroupe plus de 100 professionnels de santé couvrant des domaines comme la nutrition, la dermatologie, le sommeil et le mal de dos.

🔍 Que recherchons-nous ?

Nous recrutons aujourd’hui des dermatologues pour poursuivre le développement de notre service de messagerie par chat.

Ce service met en relation les assurés avec des médecins par messagerie 7 jours sur 7, avec comme priorités d’assurer la sécurité des données et un secret médical absolu (aucune visibilité de l’assurance sur les conversations).

Il ne s’agit pas de téléconsultation, mais plutôt de téléconseil. Il n’y a pas de rédaction d’ordonnance, et le tout se fait par écrit.

Nous comptons déjà une dermatologue dans l’équipe et nous en cherchons un(e) autre qui serait intéressé(e) pour nous rejoindre et répondre aux questions !

👨‍⚕️ Quel profil nous intéresse ?

Nous recherchons des dermatologues ayant envie d’aider nos membres via notre chat médical: un format proche de la télé-expertise. Il est important pour nous que vous ne partagiez pas seulement des conseils médicaux, mais aussi de veiller à la manière dont vous les communiquez, en faisant preuve de bienveillance et de compréhension.

Est-ce que vous vous reconnaissez dans ce profil ?

  • Minimum 2 ans d’expérience

  • A l’aise avec le digital

  • Disponible au moins 4/5h par semaine (flexibles) pour réaliser le suivi par chat

  • Statut auto-entrepreneur ou libéral

  • Situé en France Métropolitaine

🙌 Avantages et privilèges

Chez Alan, vous contribuez à construire la prochaine génération de plateforme de santé en ligne. Voici les avantages que nous proposons:

  • Une rémunération très attractive

  • Une grande flexibilité des horaires et de votre lieu de travail : possibilité de travailler de chez vous ou de votre cabinet et de choisir les plages horaires dédiées à Alan

  • Rejoindre une communauté de professionnels de santé soudée avec laquelle vous pourrez grandir, partager et apprendre!

jobs.title: Account Executive - France 🇫🇷 (B2B)
jobs.location: Paris, France; Lyon, France; Marseille, France; Bordeaux, France

postalAddress.addressLocality: Paris, France; Lyon, France; Marseille, France; Bordeaux, France

jobs.descriptionHtml:
🐼 Who we are

You. Better. With Alan.

Alan's vision is to make prevention the new norm of care for all. Our mission is to help people live in good health to 100 while helping employers feel proud, turning health benefits from a cost centre into their most valuable investment.

We're building a vertically integrated health partner that seamlessly unites insurance and smart healthcare delivery into one system.

By connecting all aspects of care - private, public, and direct to consumer - we create the most member-centric healthcare experience. Through deep engagement, we empower everyone to overcome day-to-day health obstacles and live healthier lives.

Our team of 700+ people (still growing) operates across France 🇫🇷, Spain 🇪🇸, Belgium 🇧🇪, and Canada 🇨🇦.

🤘 How we do it ?

People joining Alan are often surprised and delighted by our innovative working method. We have a set of cultural values that guide our approach to work, such as:


🎯 What drives us — We're obsessed with helping our members live healthier

Mission is the Boss: long-term thinking, seeking our mission success above all else.

Member & customer-led: obsessively focused on solving members & customers problems and creating the most delightful experiences.


🏆 How we build excellence — We hire the best people and give them platform to succeed

Champions of excellence: extremely high standards and talent density.

Distributed ownership: accountable enlightened despots, everyone owns their decisions and results.

Radically transparent: all information is accessible and written-first, so everyone can make the best decisions asynchronously


🤝 How we grow together — We help each other improve through honest feedback and bold thinking

Optimistic alchemy: optimists who collaborate with genuine care and support teammates.

Empathetic challengers: direct, caring feedback combined with praises to help each other grow professionally

Bold & creative contrarians: think differently to achieve greatness, try new approaches


⚡ How we move fast — We fight complexity and focus on what matters most

Disciplined in execution: taking decisive actions with focus that compounds success over time

Fight for simplicity: only high impact processes, smart frugality

⭐️ The B2B Account Executive job

We’re expanding our “B2B” Sales team in France and are looking for a ‘full-stack’ Sales person to engage with prospects and turn them into happy Alan customers. This team mostly focuses on the Manufacturing industry, interacting with everyone from HR executives to CEOs.

Meet Hakim in this article to learn more about makes this segment so interesting for an Account Executive.

Why “B2B”? 

We specialize in companies that produce goods for other businesses (Manufacturers) or distribute manufactured goods to other companies (Wholesalers). Our ideal customer profile is inherently “B2B”.

Why is this vertical interesting? 

  • Market potential: A vast market with significant structural challenges like digitization, workforce evolution, and economic context.

  • Team readiness: We’ve honed our strategy over the years, and it’s paying off with increasing inbound leads and active field marketing.

  • Passionate team: Our 10-person team is passionate about sectors like textile, F&B, mechanical engineering, and the daily learnings from the field enhance this.

  • Growth opportunity: Our economics are among the most solid at Alan, and the addressable market is enormous, offering infinite opportunities for growth.

  • Day 1: We’ve grown from 0 to 10M€ ARR in just 4 years, and we’re ready to scale even further, we’re only at day 1! 

What will you do with us?

You’ll own the entire sales cycle, from prospecting to closing. In our B2B Sales team, the average sales cycle is 6 months, dealing with companies ranging from 20 to 300 employees, with an average ARR of 150K€.

At Alan, Account Executives drive deals and close strategic opportunities with prospects. We sometimes handle some customer relationships to ensure the best possible onboarding. You’ll educate prospects, provide inspiring product demos, and onboard key stakeholders, making the transition from prospect to customer seamless.

We expect you to understand and apply the Alan Smart & Soft selling method. This method ensures the prospect experience is an integral part of the overall Alan customer experience—making it pleasant and delightful for everyone. We expect you to be instructive to prospects (Smart), as well as to define the best personalized high-touch strategy that suits best each prospect (Soft).

You’ll also help us grow and improve as a company, challenging us to enhance our product(s), methods, and strategy, and getting involved in initiatives to expand our customer base.

Meet Victoire Bartholoni who started at Alan as a BDR, and who's grown as an Account Executive within one of our Sales Crews.


⭐ Is it you we’re looking for?

You’ll be a great fit for the B2B Team at Alan if you:

  • Have at least 4 years of experience managing the whole Sales cycle, from prospecting to closing. Prospection is a key part of the role;

  • Are interested in interacting with prospects from the Manufacturing industry;

  • Have full working proficiency in French (C2 and above) and an advanced level in English.

  • Are highly organized with exceptional follow-up skills;

  • Have empathy and are passionate about understanding and solving prospects' problems;

  • Can influence through persuasion, negotiation, and consensus-building;

  • Have a deep understanding of value drivers in recurring revenue business models;

  • Have a great attitude and ability to collaborate in a small team;

  • Are eager to learn fast and make an impact from day 1;

  • Are based in (or willing to relocate to) Paris, Bordeaux, Lyon or Marseille.

For this opportunity, we are aiming to hire within the C0-D level range.


Everything else is a plus. We care about having a diversity of experiences, profiles and backgrounds in our team.


🙌   Perks & Benefits

At Alan, we believe that being in good health is a basic need, and it starts with our employees. This is why Alaners are provided with a stimulating environment and perks ensuring they are happy, efficient and spend only high-quality time with co-workers.

Therefore, we offer:

  • Fair rewards. Generous equity packages complement your base salary, for permanent contracts only.

  • Flexible office with hybrid setup. Amazing office space at our Paris HQ or sponsored co-working hubs in Bordeaux, Lyon or Marseille.

  • All the tools you need. Top of the range equipment: Macbook Air, keyboard, laptop stand, monitor, and Bose noise-canceling headphones.

  • Flexible vacation policy and flexible working hours. Organize your time as you wish.

  • Delightful healthcare insurance: Extremely comprehensive health insurance - 100% for you and your children, 90-100% for partners depending on your country (permanent contracts only).

  • Transport. Generous transit benefit

  • Learning & Training opportunities. A highly flexible training policy free books and budget to attend and speak at conferences if the opportunity arises.

  • Personal growth through coaching: At Alan, coaching isn't just a perk - it's core to who we are. Every Alaner is paired with a dedicated coach from day one, who helps maximize their impact, nurture engagement, and navigate Alan's values to develop their full potential. Learn more about our coaching culture.

  • Parental leave. Extended parental leave for all new parents, for permanent contracts only.

Important note: we hire people, not roles.

If you're excited about this opportunity but don't check every box, we'd love to hear from you. Everyone, no matter how underrepresented, should feel free to apply as it can only bring learnings or success.

If you identify yourself as a woman: Did you know that research shows women often apply only when meeting 100% of requirements?

Remember, this is just a guide, not a checklist.

We'll be thrilled to receive your application!

🔖 Check out our About Alan and Career pages, as well as our Medium, blog and Glassdoor page for more info.

 - Are eager to learn fast and make an impact from day 1;

 - Are based in (or willing to relocate to) Paris, Bordeaux, Lyon or Marseille.

For this opportunity, we are aiming to hire within the C0-D level range https://alan.com/en/careers/a/salary-equity.



EVERYTHING ELSE IS A PLUS. WE CARE ABOUT HAVING A DIVERSITY OF EXPERIENCES, PROFILES AND BACKGROUNDS IN OUR TEAM.




🙌   PERKS & BENEFITS https://alan.com/about/life-at-alan/a/perks

At Alan, we believe that being in good health is a basic need, and it starts with our employees. This is why Alaners are provided with a stimulating environment and perks ensuring they are happy, efficient and spend only high-quality time with co-workers.

Therefore, we offer:

 - Fair rewards. Generous equity packages complement your base salary, for permanent contracts only.

 - Flexible office with hybrid setup. Amazing office space at our Paris HQ or sponsored co-working hubs in Bordeaux, Lyon or Marseille.

 - All the tools you need. Top of the range equipment: Macbook Air, keyboard, laptop stand, monitor, and Bose noise-canceling headphones.

 - Flexible vacation policy and flexible working hours. Organize your time as you wish.

 - Delightful healthcare insurance: Extremely comprehensive health insurance - 100% for you and your children, 90-100% for partners depending on your country (permanent contracts only).

 - Transport. Generous transit benefit

 - Learning & Training opportunities. A highly flexible training policy free books and budget to attend and speak at conferences if the opportunity arises.

 - Personal growth through coaching: At Alan, coaching isn't just a perk - it's core to who we are. Every Alaner is paired with a dedicated coach from day one, who helps maximize their impact, nurture engagement, and navigate Alan's values to develop their full potential. Learn more about our coaching culture https://alan.com/en/blog/discover-alan/a/alan-culture-excellence-through-coaching.

 - Parental leave. Extended parental leave for all new parents, for permanent contracts only.
   


IMPORTANT NOTE: WE HIRE PEOPLE, NOT ROLES.

If you're excited about this opportunity but don't check every box, we'd love to hear from you. Everyone, no matter how underrepresented, should feel free to apply as it can only bring learnings or success.

If you identify yourself as a woman: Did you know that research shows women often apply only when meeting 100% of requirements?

Remember, this is just a guide, not a checklist.

We'll be thrilled to receive your application!

🔖 Check out our About Alan https://alan.com/about and Career https://alan.com/careers pages, as well as our Medium https://medium.com/alan, blog https://blog.alan.com/ and Glassdoor page https://www.glassdoor.com/Overview/Working-at-Alan-EI_IE1696043.11,15.htm for more info.

jobs.title: Account Executive - Belgium 🇧🇪 (Dutch speaking)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
🐼 Who we are

You. Better. With Alan.

Alan's vision is to make prevention the new norm of care for all. Our mission is to help people live in good health to 100 while helping employers feel proud, turning health benefits from a cost centre into their most valuable investment.

We're building a vertically integrated health partner that seamlessly unites insurance and smart healthcare delivery into one system.

By connecting all aspects of care - private, public, and direct to consumer - we create the most member-centric healthcare experience. Through deep engagement, we empower everyone to overcome day-to-day health obstacles and live healthier lives.

We partner with 35K+ companies of all sizes, serving more than 950+ members, and have reached 680M+ in ARR.

Our team of 700+ people (still growing) operates across France 🇫🇷, Spain 🇪🇸, Belgium 🇧🇪, and Canada 🇨🇦.

🤘 How we do it ?

People joining Alan are often surprised and delighted by our innovative working method. We have a set of cultural values that guide our approach to work, such as:

🎯 What drives us — We're obsessed with helping our members live healthier

Mission is the Boss: long-term thinking, seeking our mission success above all else.

Member & customer-led: obsessively focused on solving members & customers problems and creating the most delightful experiences.


🏆 How we build excellence — We hire the best people and give them platform to succeed

Champions of excellence: extremely high standards and talent density.

Distributed ownership: accountable enlightened despots, everyone owns their decisions and results.

Radically transparent: all information is accessible and written-first, so everyone can make the best decisions asynchronously


🤝 How we grow together — We help each other improve through honest feedback and bold thinking

Optimistic alchemy: optimists who collaborate with genuine care and support teammates.

Empathetic challengers: direct, caring feedback combined with praises to help each other grow professionally

Bold & creative contrarians: think differently to achieve greatness, try new approaches


⚡ How we move fast — We fight complexity and focus on what matters most

Disciplined in execution: taking decisive actions with focus that compounds success over time

Fight for simplicity: only high impact processes, smart frugality

⭐ Your mission

As we continue to build our Sales team locally, we are looking for several ‘full-stack’ Sales. You can call it Sales, Business development... What is important for us is the mission:  help companies transition to a more personal, proactive and holistic health partner.

At Alan, Sales drive deals, manage key customer relationships and help close strategic opportunities with prospects. You are directly responsible for educating prospects, providing inspiring product demonstrations, and onboarding companies’ key stakeholders as you make the transition from prospect to customer. 

At the same time, we expect you to understand, embrace and apply the Alan Smart & Soft selling method. This method stems from the concept that the prospect experience is an inseparable piece of the overall Alan customer experience. 

You are expected to make this experience pleasant, instructive and delightful by leveraging the most relevant messaging and materials (Smart) and by defining the high-touch strategy that suits best each prospect (Soft). 

We also expect you to look at the big picture and help us grow and improve as a company. For that, you’ll have to be real team players even beyond your role. You’ll be expected to challenge us to improve our product(s), our methods and our strategy, and get involved in other projects and initiatives relevant to growing our customer base. 

⭐ Sales Team at Alan ⭐ 

Since we opened our Belgium market in 2020, we have experienced great momentum and traction. We’ve onboarded 800+ companies, and delighted 40.000+ members so far. Our local team is growing (so far we went from 0 to 65+ in just over 4 years 🚀).

We now want to take the market by storm and exponentially grow the business to ultimately become the market leader by 2030 in Belgium. Our sales team is the engine that drives our B to B customer reach. We want to keep that bar very high by hiring the most exceptional Sales!

Being a Sales at Alan means joining a team of talented, committed and passionate sales experts. We move fast, with a lot of ownership, and are proud to tackle big problems! 

⭐ Your profile ⭐ 

You will be a good fit to join the Sales team at Alan if you: 

  • Have previous experience in a Sales role 

  • Have strong written & verbal communication skills

  • Are fluent in English and Dutch (Flemish) 

  • Are highly organized with exceptional follow-up skills 

  • Have empathy and are passionate about understanding and solving prospects' problems 

  • Ability to manage influence through persuasion, negotiation, and consensus building

  • Deep understanding of value drivers in recurring revenue business models

  • A great attitude and ability to collaborate in a small team

  • Have a desire to learn fast and make an impact from day 1 

Everything else is a plus. We care about having a diversity of experiences, profiles and backgrounds in our team. 

For this opportunity, we are aiming to hire within the B1-D level range.

🙌   Perks & Benefits

At Alan, we believe that being in good health is a basic need, and it starts with our employees. This is why Alaners are provided with a stimulating environment and perks ensuring they are happy, efficient and spend only high-quality time with co-workers. 

Therefore, we offer:

  • Fair rewards. Generous equity packages complement your base salary.

  • Flexible Office. Amazing office space at our HQ in Paris, sponsored co-working hubs in Ghent Brussels or Antwerp or a full-remote experience with home office equipment sponsorship, we want you to live where you’re the happiest.

  • All the tools you need. Top of the range equipment: Macbook Pro, keyboard, laptop stand, monitor, and Bose noise-canceling headphones.

  • Flexible vacation policy and flexible working hours. Organize your  time as you  wish.

  • Delightful healthcare insurance: Extremely comprehensive health insurance - 100% for you and your children, 90-100% for partners depending on your country (permanent contracts only).

  • Transport. You can use your own inspiration based on the Green mobility budget (for Senior level Alaners)

  • Learning & Training opportunities. A highly  flexible Training policy free books and budget to attend and speak at conferences if the opportunity arises.

  • Personal growth through coaching: At Alan, coaching isn't just a perk - it's core to who we are. Every Alaner is paired with a dedicated coach from day one, who helps maximize their impact, nurture engagement, and navigate Alan's values to develop their full potential. Learn more about our coaching culture.

  • Parental leave. Extended parental leave for all new parents.

Important note: we hire people, not roles.

If you're excited about this opportunity but don't check every box, we'd love to hear from you. Everyone, no matter how underrepresented, should feel free to apply as it can only bring learnings or success.

If you identify yourself as a woman: Did you know that research shows women often apply only when meeting 100% of requirements?

Remember, this is just a guide, not a checklist.

We'll be thrilled to receive your application!

🔖 Check out our About Alan and Career pages, as well as our Medium, blog and Glassdoor page for more info.

jobs.title: Analytics and pricing expert - Insurance
jobs.descriptionHtml:

🤘 How we do it ?

People joining Alan are always surprised and delighted by our innovative working method. We have a set of cultural values that guide our approach to work, such as:

🎯 What drives us — We're obsessed with helping our members live healthier

  1. Mission is the Boss: long-term thinking, seeking our mission success above all else.

  2. Member & customer-led: obsessively focused on solving members & customers problems and creating the most delightful experiences.

🏆 How we build excellence — We hire the best people and give them platform to succeed

  1. Champions of excellence: extremely high standards and talent density.

  2. Distributed ownership: accountable enlightened despots, everyone owns their decisions and results.

  3. Radically transparent: all information is accessible and written-first, so everyone can make the best decisions asynchronously

🤝 How we grow together — We help each other improve through honest feedback and bold thinking

  1. Optimistic alchemy: optimists who collaborate with genuine care and support teammates.

  2. Empathetic challengers: direct, caring feedback combined with praises to help each other grow professionally

  3. Bold & creative contrarians: think differently to achieve greatness, try new approaches

⚡ How we move fast — We fight complexity and focus on what matters most

  1. Disciplined in execution: taking decisive actions with focus that compounds success over time

  2. Fight for simplicity: only high impact processes, smart frugality

⭐️ The Insurance Team ⭐️

Being part of Alan's insurance community is a great opportunity to have a significant impact on people's health and wellbeing in our multiple countries of operation.

  • We are at the heart of Alan’s mission, bringing to the team our technical leadership and expertise on healthcare and death & disability insurance.

  • We work hand in hand with our data scientists, designers, engineers and product managers to build the most differentiating products and provide a delightful experience at a fair price.

  • We build and manage offers for large companies and public institutions with our sales and account management teams.

  • We make sure our portfolio is closely monitored and risks are effectively managed.

  • We also manage our capital, steer our reinsurance strategy and maintain a trusting relationship with our insurance regulators.

️ ⭐️ Your role ⭐️ ️

  • Partner with sales teams to price and develop compelling proposals for very large corporate clients and public institutions

  • Serve as a trusted technical advisor in client meeting, delivering expert insights that build confidence in our solutions

  • Design delightful insurance products meeting both member needs and regulatory requirements

  • Support key account managers in nurturing and renewing our most strategic client relationships

  • Develop scalable tools, frameworks and knowledge resources that empower further our sales teams 

⭐️ Is it you we’re looking for? ⭐️ 

You would thrive in this role if you: 

  • Are able to navigate and synthesize technical, data, legal and business considerations related to health and income protection insurance

  • 2 years of experience in Health and/or "Prevoyance" Insurance are a big plus but are not required

  • Are analytical and structured, with a fact-based decision-making style

  • Are excited about bringing technical expertise in a business-centric context

  • Are willing to deeply change the insurance industry and challenge the status quo

  • Approach challenges with a scalability perspective, continuously identifying opportunities to optimize processes and systems

  • Have strong written communication skills, with the ability to simplify complex concepts

  • Are fluent in both French (French clients) and English (Alan’s working language)

🙌 Perks & Benefits

At Alan, we believe that being in good health is a basic need, and it starts with our employees. This is why Alaners are provided with a stimulating environment and perks ensuring they are happy, efficient and spend only high-quality time with co-workers.

Therefore, we offer:

  • Fair rewards. Generous equity packages complement your base salary.

  • Flexible Office. Amazing office space at our HQ, sponsored co-working hubs or a full-remote experience with home office equipment sponsorship, we want you to live where you’re the happiest.

  • All the tools you need. Top of the range equipment: Macbook Pro, keyboard, laptop stand, monitor, and Bose noise-canceling headphones.

  • Flexible vacation policy and flexible working hours. organize your time as you wish.

  • Delightful healthcare insurance: Extremely comprehensive health insurance - 100% for you and your children, 90-100% for partners depending on your country (permanent contracts only).

  • Transport. Country-specific commuter benefits.

  • Learning & Training opportunities. A highly flexible Training policy free books and budget to attend and speak at conferences if the opportunity arises.

  • Personal growth through coaching: At Alan, coaching isn't just a perk - ****it's core to who we are. Every Alaner is paired with a dedicated coach from day one, who helps maximize their impact, nurture engagement, and navigate Alan's values to develop their full potential. Learn more about our coaching culture.

  • Parental leave. Extended parental leave for all new parents.

Important note: we hire people, not roles.

If you're excited about this opportunity but don't check every box, we'd love to hear from you. Everyone, no matter how underrepresented, should feel free to apply as it can only bring learnings or success.

If you identify yourself as a woman: Did you know that research shows women often apply only when meeting 100% of requirements?

Remember, this is just a guide, not a checklist.

We'll be thrilled to receive your application!

🔖 Check out our About Alan and Career pages, as well as our Medium, blog and Glassdoor page for more info.

Fight for simplicity: only high impact processes, smart frugality

⭐️ Your mission ⭐️

👩‍💻Helping our members

As a Care Expert, your primary mission is to transform member requests into delightful experiences. You'll be their trusted guide, providing:

✨ Meaningful solutions that make a real difference

⚡️ Swift, timely responses when they need you most

🎯 Crystal-clear, accurate information

🤝 Transparent and helpful guidance every step of the way

You'll dive into the fascinating world of healthcare, mastering both:

  • The intricacies of the French healthcare system

  • The unique needs of our B2B partners who've chosen Alan as their corporate health insurance provider

Your role sits at the heart of what makes Alan special – turning complex healthcare questions into simple, human experiences.

👷Improving Alan

🎯 Your time at Alan: A perfect balance

  • 80% dedicated to providing exceptional member support

  • 20% driving innovative Care projects tailored to your unique expertise

🚀 Project leadership opportunities

As an experienced Care Expert, you'll have the chance to:

✨ Drive Process Excellence

  • Identify and implement key improvements

  • Transform data insights into actionable solutions

  • Lead end-to-end implementation

👥 Team impact

  • Guide and inspire fellow Alaners

  • Build high-performing project teams

  • Shape the future of Care at Alan

🌟 Example of projects you might lead:

  • Design member empowerment initiatives that boost autonomy

  • Architect Care team structures for peak performance

  • Collaborate on cross-community product innovations

  • Help us grow by attracting top Care talent

Your projects will be shaped by your passions and expertise, making each role truly unique!

⭐ Join the Care team! ⭐️  

You will thrive at Alan if you:

  • Have a genuine passion for helping others and find joy in solving member challenges

  • Master French and English at a full working proficiency level (written and spoken)

  • Navigate technology with confidence and embrace digital tools

  • Feel at ease connecting with members across all channels - email, chat, and phone calls (call-back only)

  • Bring natural empathy and a calm presence to every interaction

  • Love taking initiative and turning ideas into action

  • Thrive in collaborative environments where you can both learn and share knowledge

  • Bonus: Already understand the French healthcare system (but don't worry if you don't - we're great teachers! 😉)

For this opportunity, we are aiming to hire within the A2-B1 level range of our salary grid.

ℹ️  Your home base should be in France (fiscal residence), where you'll be part of our vibrant Care Expert team 🇫🇷.

🙌   Perks & Benefits

At Alan, we believe that being in good health is a basic need, and it starts with our employees. This is why Alaners are provided with a stimulating environment and perks ensuring they are happy, efficient and spend only high-quality time with co-workers. 

Therefore, we offer:

  • Fair rewards. Generous equity packages complement your base salary, for permanent contracts only.

  • Flexible Office. Amazing office space at our HQ, sponsored co-working hubs or a full-remote experience with home office equipment sponsorship, we want you to live where you’re the happiest.

  • All the tools you need. Top of the range equipment: Macbook Pro, keyboard, laptop stand, monitor, and Bose noise-canceling headphones.

  • Flexible vacation policy and flexible working hours. Organize your time as you wish.

  • Delightful healthcare insurance: Extremely comprehensive health insurance - 100% for you and your children, 90-100% for partners depending on your country (permanent contracts only).

  • Transport. Country-specific commuter benefits.

  • Learning & Training opportunities. A highly flexible Training policy free books and budget to attend and speak at conferences if the opportunity arises.

  • Personal growth through coaching: At Alan, coaching isn't just a perk - it's core to who we are. Every Alaner is paired with a dedicated coach from day one, who helps maximize their impact, nurture engagement, and navigate Alan's values to develop their full potential. Learn more about our coaching culture.

  • Parental leave. Extended parental leave for all new parents, for permanent contracts only.

Important note: we hire people, not roles.

If you're excited about this opportunity but don't check every box, we'd love to hear from you. Everyone, no matter how underrepresented, should feel free to apply as it can only bring learnings or success.

If you identify yourself as a woman: Did you know that research shows women often apply only when meeting 100% of requirements?

Remember, this is just a guide, not a checklist.

We'll be thrilled to receive your application!

🔖 Check out our About Alan and Career pages, as well as our Medium, blog and Glassdoor page for more info.
jobs.descriptionPlain:
🐼 WHO WE ARE

You. Better. With Alan.

Alan's vision is to make prevention the new norm of care for all. Our mission is to help people live in good health to 100 while helping employers feel proud, turning health benefits from a cost centre into their most valuable investment.

We're building a vertically integrated health partner that seamlessly unites insurance and smart healthcare delivery into one system.

By connecting all aspects of care - private, public, and direct to consumer - we create the most member-centric healthcare experience. Through deep engagement, we empower everyone to overcome day-to-day health obstacles and live healthier lives.

We partner with 35K+ companies of all sizes, serving more than 950+ members, and have reached 680M+ in ARR.

Our team of 700+ people (still growing) operates across France 🇫🇷, Spain 🇪🇸, Belgium 🇧🇪, and Canada 🇨🇦.


🤘 HOW WE DO IT ?

People joining Alan are often surprised and delighted by our innovative working method. We have a set of cultural values https://alan.com/about/company-culture that guide our approach to work, such as:

🎯 What drives us — We're obsessed with helping our members live healthier

Mission is the Boss: long-term thinking, seeking our mission success above all else.

Member & customer-led: obsessively focused on solving members & customers problems and creating the most delightful experiences.


🏆 How we build excellence — We hire the best people and give them platform to succeed

Champions of excellence: extremely high standards and talent density.

Distributed ownership: accountable enlightened despots, everyone owns their decisions and results.

Radically transparent: all information is accessible and written-first, so everyone can make the best decisions asynchronously


🤝 How we grow together — We help each other improve through honest feedback and bold thinking

Optimistic alchemy: optimists who collaborate with genuine care and support teammates.

Empathetic challengers: direct, caring feedback combined with praises to help each other grow professionally

Bold & creative contrarians: think differently to achieve greatness, try new approaches


⚡ How we move fast — We fight complexity and focus on what matters most

Disciplined in execution: taking decisive actions with focus that compounds success over time

Fight for simplicity: only high impact processes, smart frugality

jobs.title: Paris Recruitment Day - Sales Graduate Program 🇫🇷
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Participe à notre journée exceptionnelle de recrutement pour rejoindre notre Sales Graduate Program chez Alan !

Tu es diplômé(e) d'un Master avec maximum 2 ans d'expérience et tu souhaites débuter ta carrière dans la vente ? Le jeudi 6 novembre 2025, Alan t’invite à une journée de recrutement exclusive dans nos bureaux parisiens.

Nous ouvrons seulement 20 places pour participer à cette journée, avec l’opportunité unique de décrocher ton CDI au sein de notre Sales Graduate Program. Saisis ta chance de lancer ta carrière en tant que Business Development Representative (BDR) dès janvier 2026, d’acquérir des bases solides en vente, et de tracer ta voie vers des rôles Sales seniors chez Alan en 18 à 24 mois !

Pourquoi participer ?

  • Vis une expérience unique & décroche ta place dans notre Sales Graduate Program : un véritable tremplin pour propulser ta carrière dans la vente.

  • Plonge dans l’univers d’Alan : découvre notre vision et notre ambition au contact direct de nos Alaners.

  • Bénéficie d’un process rapide & transparent : avec une réponse sous 48h à l’issue de la journée.

  • Plonge au cœur du métier de BDR chez Alan : découvre concrètement ce rôle à travers des mises en situation et des échanges privilégiés avec l’équipe.

Le processus de recrutement :

  • 📅 Date de l’événement : Jeudi 6 novembre, 2025

  • 📍 Lieu : Siège d’Alan : 117 Quai de Valmy, 75010 Paris

  • ⏰ Date limite de candidature : Dimanche 26 octobre, 2026

  • 📈 Les étapes :

    • Nous étudions toutes les candidatures reçues pour sélectionner les meilleurs profils.

    • Si ton profil est retenu, nous t’appellerons pour t’annoncer la nouvelle et échanger brièvement sur tes motivations.

    • Tu recevras un cas pratique à réaliser chez toi : des questions de motivation et un pitch vidéo à enregistrer.

    • Les candidat(e)s retenu(e)s seront invité(e)s à rejoindre notre journée exclusive au siège d’Alan, avec au programme une étude de cas et des entretiens.

    • À l’issue de cette journée, nous donnons notre réponse en 48h, et les profils sélectionnés rejoindront l’aventure Alan au sein de notre Sales Graduate Program à partir de janvier 2026 !

⭐️ Tout savoir sur notre Sales Graduate Program

Le principe ? Sur une période de 18 à 24 mois, nous t’offrons l'opportunité d'évoluer au sein du rôle de Business Development Representative (BDR) en acquérant progressivement des compétences plus avancées dans la vente.

  • Phase 1 : Apprends les bases du métier de BDR : prospection, compréhension du marché, création d’opportunités, échanges avec des décideurs.

  • Phase 2 : Développe ton leadership : en tant que BDR, prends des responsabilités transverses telles que le recrutement, le coaching des nouveaux, l’animation de formations et la gestion de projets.

  • Phase 3 : Spécialise-toi : concentre-toi soit sur la prospection des grands comptes (plus complexes et stratégiques), soit sur les PME, en menant des rendez-vous de découverte et des démonstrations produit.

Cette progression au sein du rôle de BDR te permettra de développer des compétences commerciales complètes qui te prépareront à une future mobilité interne en tant qu'Account Executive ou Inbound Sales.

Envie d’en savoir plus sur le Sales Graduate Program ?

👉 Découvre les coulisses de la première promotion ici

👉 Découvre comment on a conçu le programme ici

👉 Lis le témoignage inspirant d’Aude-Line sur le programme

👉 Explore notre approche unique de la vente

💥 Es-tu notre candidat idéal ?

Chez Alan, notre devise est "nous recrutons des personnes, pas des rôles" : nous valorisons les compétences interpersonnelles plus que techniques. Nous croyons que ton potentiel est ce qui compte vraiment.

Tu seras un bon fit pour rejoindre l'équipe Sales d'Alan si :

  • Tu détiens un Master d'une école de commerce, avec jusqu'à deux ans d'expérience professionnelle ;

  • Tu montres un intérêt fort pour la vente, et détiens idéalement une première expérience dans ce domaine

  • Tu es enthousiaste, animé(e) par notre mission, et désireux(se) de partager notre ambition ;

  • Tu es team player, organisé(e), et capable de gérer plusieurs tâches simultanément ;

  • Tu es désireux(se) d'apprendre et de grandir dans de nouveaux rôles ;

  • Tu es basé(e) à (ou prêt(e) à déménager à) Paris ou Bordeaux

Prêt(e) à rejoindre notre Business Development Representative - Graduate Program ?

Pour cette opportunité, nous visons à recruter dans la fourchette de niveau A2-B1.

🐼 Qui sommes-nous ?

La vision d'Alan est de faire de la prévention la nouvelle norme de soin pour tous.

Notre mission est d'aider les gens à vivre en bonne santé jusqu'à 100 ans tout en aidant les employeurs à être fiers, transformant les avantages santé d'un centre de coûts en leur investissement le plus précieux.

Nous construisons un partenaire santé intégré qui unit harmonieusement assurance et prestations de soins intelligentes en un seul système.

En connectant tous les aspects du soin - privé, public et direct consommateur - nous créons une expérience santé centrée sur nos membres. Grâce à un engagement profond, nous donnons à chacun les moyens de surmonter les obstacles de santé du quotidien et de vivre plus sainement.

Nous sommes partenaires de 35 000+ entreprises de toutes tailles, servons plus de 950 000+ membres, et avons atteint 680M+ d'ARR.

Notre équipe de 700+ personnes (toujours en croissance) opère en France 🇫🇷, Espagne 🇪🇸, Belgique 🇧🇪, et Canada 🇨🇦.

🚀 Comment on s'y prend ?

Les personnes qui rejoignent Alan sont souvent surprises et ravies par notre méthode de travail innovante. Nous avons un ensemble de valeurs culturelles qui guident notre approche du travail :

🎯 Ce qui nous anime - Nous sommes obsédés par l'idée d'aider nos membres à vivre plus sainement

La Mission est le Boss : pensée long terme, recherche du succès de notre mission avant tout.

Centrés sur nos membres et clients : focalisés sur la résolution des problèmes de nos membres et clients et la création d’expériences remarquables.

🏆 Comment nous construisons l'excellence - Nous recrutons les meilleures personnes et leur donnons les moyens pour réussir

Champions de l'excellence : standards extrêmement élevés et densité de talents.

Responsabilisation des équipes : despotes éclairés responsables, chacun est responsable de ses décisions et résultats.

Radicalement transparent : toutes les informations sont accessibles et écrites, pour que chacun puisse prendre les meilleures décisions de manière asynchrone.

🤝 Comment nous grandissons ensemble - Nous nous aidons mutuellement à nous améliorer grâce à des retours honnêtes et une pensée audacieuse

Synergie positive : optimistes qui collaborent avec bienveillance et soutiennent leurs coéquipiers. Challengers empathiques : feedback direct et bienveillant accompagné d'encouragements pour nous aider à grandir professionnellement.

Créativité disruptive : penser autrement pour atteindre l'excellence, explorer de nouvelles voies.

⚡ Comment nous bougeons vite - Nous combattons la complexité et nous nous concentrons sur ce qui compte le plus

Exécution rigoureuse : actions décisives et focalisées qui génèrent du succès sur la durée.

Cultiver la simplicité : privilégier les processus à fort impact, frugalité réfléchie.

🙌 Avantages & Bénéfices

Chez Alan, nous croyons qu'être en bonne santé est un besoin fondamental, et cela commence avec nos employés. C'est pourquoi les Alaners bénéficient d'un environnement stimulant et d'avantages garantissant qu'ils sont heureux, efficaces et ne passent que du temps de qualité avec leurs collègues.

Par conséquent, nous offrons :

  • Récompenses équitables. Des packages d'equity généreux complètent ton salaire de base.

  • Bureau flexible. Espace de bureau incroyable dans notre HQ à Paris ou hub de co-working sponsorisé à Bordeaux.

  • Tous les outils dont tu as besoin. Équipement haut de gamme : Macbook Pro, clavier, support laptop, écran, et casque anti-bruit.

  • Politique de vacances flexible et horaires de travail flexibles. Organise ton temps comme tu le souhaites.

  • Assurance santé complète - prise en charge à 100% pour toi et tes enfants, 90-100% pour les partenaires selon ton pays (contrats permanents uniquement).

  • Transport. Avantages de transport spécifiques au pays.

  • Opportunités d'apprentissage et de formation. Politique de formation très flexible, livres gratuits et budget pour assister et parler lors de conférences si l'opportunité se présente.

  • Croissance personnelle par le coaching : Chez Alan, le coaching n'est pas juste un avantage - c'est au cœur de qui nous sommes. Chaque Alaner est accompagné par un coach dédié dès le premier jour, qui aide à maximiser son impact, nourrir l'engagement, et naviguer les valeurs d'Alan pour développer son plein potentiel.

  • Congé parental. Congé parental étendu pour tous les nouveaux parents.

Note importante : nous recrutons des personnes, pas des rôles.

Si tu es intéressé(e) par cette opportunité mais ne coches pas toutes les cases, nous aimerions avoir de tes nouvelles. Tout le monde devrait se sentir libre de postuler car cela ne peut qu'apporter apprentissages ou succès.

Si tu t'identifies comme une femme : Savais-tu que les recherches montrent que les femmes postulent souvent, uniquement, quand elles remplissent 100% des exigences ?

Rappelle-toi, c'est juste un guide, pas une checklist.

Nous serons ravis de recevoir ta candidature !

🔖 Consulte nos pages À propos d'Alan, Medium et Carrières, ainsi que notre blog et page Glassdoor pour plus d'infos.

🎯 Ce qui nous anime - Nous sommes obsédés par l'idée d'aider nos membres à vivre plus sainement

La Mission est le Boss : pensée long terme, recherche du succès de notre mission avant tout.

Centrés sur nos membres et clients : focalisés sur la résolution des problèmes de nos membres et clients et la création d’expériences remarquables.

🏆 Comment nous construisons l'excellence - Nous recrutons les meilleures personnes et leur donnons les moyens pour réussir

Champions de l'excellence : standards extrêmement élevés et densité de talents.

Responsabilisation des équipes : despotes éclairés responsables, chacun est responsable de ses décisions et résultats.

Radicalement transparent : toutes les informations sont accessibles et écrites, pour que chacun puisse prendre les meilleures décisions de manière asynchrone.

🤝 Comment nous grandissons ensemble - Nous nous aidons mutuellement à nous améliorer grâce à des retours honnêtes et une pensée audacieuse

Synergie positive : optimistes qui collaborent avec bienveillance et soutiennent leurs coéquipiers. Challengers empathiques : feedback direct et bienveillant accompagné d'encouragements pour nous aider à grandir professionnellement.

Créativité disruptive : penser autrement pour atteindre l'excellence, explorer de nouvelles voies.

⚡ Comment nous bougeons vite - Nous combattons la complexité et nous nous concentrons sur ce qui compte le plus

Exécution rigoureuse : actions décisives et focalisées qui génèrent du succès sur la durée.

Cultiver la simplicité : privilégier les processus à fort impact, frugalité réfléchie.


🙌 AVANTAGES & BÉNÉFICES https://alan.com/en/careers/a/salary-equity

Chez Alan, nous croyons qu'être en bonne santé est un besoin fondamental, et cela commence avec nos employés. C'est pourquoi les Alaners bénéficient d'un environnement stimulant et d'avantages garantissant qu'ils sont heureux, efficaces et ne passent que du temps de qualité avec leurs collègues.

Par conséquent, nous offrons :

 - Récompenses équitables. Des packages d'equity généreux complètent ton salaire de base.

 - Bureau flexible. Espace de bureau incroyable dans notre HQ à Paris ou hub de co-working sponsorisé à Bordeaux.

 - Tous les outils dont tu as besoin. Équipement haut de gamme : Macbook Pro, clavier, support laptop, écran, et casque anti-bruit.

 - Politique de vacances flexible et horaires de travail flexibles. Organise ton temps comme tu le souhaites.

 - Assurance santé complète - prise en charge à 100% pour toi et tes enfants, 90-100% pour les partenaires selon ton pays (contrats permanents uniquement).

 - Transport. Avantages de transport spécifiques au pays.

 - Opportunités d'apprentissage et de formation. Politique de formation très flexible, livres gratuits et budget pour assister et parler lors de conférences si l'opportunité se présente.

 - Croissance personnelle par le coaching : Chez Alan, le coaching n'est pas juste un avantage - c'est au cœur de qui nous sommes. Chaque Alaner est accompagné par un coach dédié dès le premier jour, qui aide à maximiser son impact, nourrir l'engagement, et naviguer les valeurs d'Alan pour développer son plein potentiel.

 - Congé parental. Congé parental étendu pour tous les nouveaux parents.


NOTE IMPORTANTE : NOUS RECRUTONS DES PERSONNES, PAS DES RÔLES.

Si tu es intéressé(e) par cette opportunité mais ne coches pas toutes les cases, nous aimerions avoir de tes nouvelles. Tout le monde devrait se sentir libre de postuler car cela ne peut qu'apporter apprentissages ou succès.

Si tu t'identifies comme une femme : Savais-tu que les recherches montrent que les femmes postulent souvent, uniquement, quand elles remplissent 100% des exigences ?

Rappelle-toi, c'est juste un guide, pas une checklist.

Nous serons ravis de recevoir ta candidature !

🔖 Consulte nos pages À propos d'Alan https://alan.com/en/about, Medium https://medium.com/alan et Carrières https://alan.com/en/careers, ainsi que notre blog https://alan.com/fr-fr/blog et page Glassdoor https://www.glassdoor.fr/Pr%C3%A9sentation/Travailler-chez-Alan-EI_IE1696043.16,20.htm?countryRedirect=true pour plus d'infos.

jobs.title: Sales Graduate Program 🇫🇷
jobs.descriptionHtml:
🐼 Who we are

You. Better. With Alan.

Alan's vision is to make prevention the new norm of care for all. Our mission is to help people live in good health to 100 while helping employers feel proud, turning health benefits from a cost centre into their most valuable investment.

We're building a vertically integrated health partner that seamlessly unites insurance and smart healthcare delivery into one system.

By connecting all aspects of care - private, public, and direct to consumer - we create the most member-centric healthcare experience. Through deep engagement, we empower everyone to overcome day-to-day health obstacles and live healthier lives.

We partner with 35K+ companies of all sizes, serving more than 950K+ members, and have reached 680M+ in ARR.

Our team of 700+ people (still growing) operates across France 🇫🇷, Spain 🇪🇸, Belgium 🇧🇪, and Canada 🇨🇦.

🤘 How we do it ?

People joining Alan are often surprised and delighted by our innovative working method. We have a set of cultural values that guide our approach to work, such as:

🎯 What drives us — We're obsessed with helping our members live healthier

Mission is the Boss: long-term thinking, seeking our mission success above all else.

Member & customer-led: obsessively focused on solving members & customers problems and creating the most delightful experiences.


🏆 How we build excellence — We hire the best people and give them platform to succeed

Champions of excellence: extremely high standards and talent density.

Distributed ownership: accountable enlightened despots, everyone owns their decisions and results.

Radically transparent: all information is accessible and written-first, so everyone can make the best decisions asynchronously


🤝 How we grow together — We help each other improve through honest feedback and bold thinking

Optimistic alchemy: optimists who collaborate with genuine care and support teammates.

Empathetic challengers: direct, caring feedback combined with praises to help each other grow professionally

Bold & creative contrarians: think differently to achieve greatness, try new approaches


⚡ How we move fast — We fight complexity and focus on what matters most

Disciplined in execution: taking decisive actions with focus that compounds success over time

Fight for simplicity: only high impact processes, smart frugality



⭐️ The Business Development Representative - Graduate Program ⭐️

We’re excited to open a new opportunity to join Alan's Business Development Representative (BDR) - Graduate Program, offering a remarkable start to a Sales career!

The concept? Over a period of 18-24 months, you’ll have the opportunity to gain essential Sales skills, that will prepare you for more senior positions within the Sales community.

You will work as a Business Development Representative (BDR), where you will learn the fundamentals of Sales:

  • Develop an effective prospecting strategy;

  • Understand the specifics of a market;

  • Spark the interest of a prospect via various channels (email, social networks and cold calls);

  • Book qualitative discovery meetings with C-Levels.

After 12 months in a market such as Tech, Manufacturing, Retail, or Hospitality, you will change segments to discover new prospecting methods and collaborate with another team.

In your second year, you will continue as a BDR. You will have the opportunity to apply for the BDR Enterprise position, targeting large accounts (companies with more than 300 employees) or take on the added challenge of conducting discovery meetings and product demonstrations for small businesses.

These experiences will prepare you for an internal mobility as an Account Executive, for example (watch Victoire).

If you want to know more about the Business Development Representative (BDR) - Graduate Program, listen to Matthieu a team member, check this blogpost as well as this one about our unique approach to Sales.

⭐️ Is it what you are looking for? ⭐️

At Alan, our motto is "we hire people, not roles": we value interpersonal skills over technical ones. We believe your potential is what truly counts.

You will be a good fit to join the Sales team at Alan if:

  • You hold a Master's degree from a business school, with up to two years of professional experience;

  • You are enthusiastic, driven by our mission, and eager to share our ambition;

  • You are a team player, organized, and able to manage multiple tasks simultaneously;

  • You are eager to learn and grow in new roles;

  • You are based in (or willing to relocate to) either Paris or Bordeaux

Ready to join our Business Development Representative - Graduate Program?

For this opportunity, we are aiming to hire within the A2-B1 level range.

🙌   Perks & Benefits

At Alan, we believe that being in good health is a basic need, and it starts with our employees. This is why Alaners are provided with a stimulating environment and perks ensuring they are happy, efficient and spend only high-quality time with co-workers. 

Therefore, we offer:

  • Fair rewards. Generous equity packages complement your base salary.

  • Flexible Office. Amazing office space at our HQ in Paris or sponsored co-working hub in Bordeaux.

  • All the tools you need. Top of the range equipment: Macbook Pro, keyboard, laptop stand, monitor, and noise-canceling headphones.

  • Flexible vacation policy and flexible working hours. Organize your time as you wish.

  • Delightful healthcare insurance: Extremely comprehensive health insurance - 100% for you and your children, 90-100% for partners depending on your country (permanent contracts only).

  • Transport. Country-specific commuter benefits.

  • Learning & Training opportunities. A highly  flexible Training policy free books and budget to attend and speak at conferences if the opportunity arises.

  • Personal growth through coaching: At Alan, coaching isn't just a perk - it's core to who we are. Every Alaner is paired with a dedicated coach from day one, who helps maximize their impact, nurture engagement, and navigate Alan's values to develop their full potential. Learn more about our coaching culture.

  • Parental leave. Extended parental leave for all new parents.

Important note: we hire people, not roles.

If you're excited about this opportunity but don't check every box, we'd love to hear from you. Everyone, no matter how underrepresented, should feel free to apply as it can only bring learnings or success.

If you identify yourself as a woman: Did you know that research shows women often apply only when meeting 100% of requirements?

Remember, this is just a guide, not a checklist.

We'll be thrilled to receive your application!

🔖 Check out our About Alan and Career pages, as well as our Medium, blog and Glassdoor page for more info.

jobs.title: Enterprise Account Executive - Belgium 🇧🇪  (French speaking)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
🐼 Who we are

You. Better. With Alan.

Alan's vision is to make prevention the new norm of care for all. Our mission is to help people live in good health to 100 while helping employers feel proud, turning health benefits from a cost centre into their most valuable investment.

We're building a vertically integrated health partner that seamlessly unites insurance and smart healthcare delivery into one system.

By connecting all aspects of care - private, public, and direct to consumer - we create the most member-centric healthcare experience. Through deep engagement, we empower everyone to overcome day-to-day health obstacles and live healthier lives.

We partner with 35K+ companies of all sizes, serving more than 950+ members, and have reached 680M+ in ARR.

Our team of 700+ people (still growing) operates across France 🇫🇷, Spain 🇪🇸, Belgium 🇧🇪, and Canada 🇨🇦.

🤘 How we do it ?

People joining Alan are often surprised and delighted by our innovative working method. We have a set of cultural values that guide our approach to work, such as:

🎯 What drives us — We're obsessed with helping our members live healthier

Mission is the Boss: long-term thinking, seeking our mission success above all else.

Member & customer-led: obsessively focused on solving members & customers problems and creating the most delightful experiences.


🏆 How we build excellence — We hire the best people and give them platform to succeed

Champions of excellence: extremely high standards and talent density.

Distributed ownership: accountable enlightened despots, everyone owns their decisions and results.

Radically transparent: all information is accessible and written-first, so everyone can make the best decisions asynchronously


🤝 How we grow together — We help each other improve through honest feedback and bold thinking

Optimistic alchemy: optimists who collaborate with genuine care and support teammates.

Empathetic challengers: direct, caring feedback combined with praises to help each other grow professionally

Bold & creative contrarians: think differently to achieve greatness, try new approaches


⚡ How we move fast — We fight complexity and focus on what matters most

Disciplined in execution: taking decisive actions with focus that compounds success over time

Fight for simplicity: only high impact processes, smart frugality

⭐️ Your mission

What is being an Enterprise Account Executive at Alan and why do we need them?

As we continue to build our Sales team locally, we are looking for several Enterprise Sales who target and close our largest prospects in both the private and public sector (companies from 250 to 10000 employees). You can call it Sales, Business development... What is important for us is the mission:  help companies transition to a more personal, proactive and holistic health partner.

At Alan, Sales drive deals, manage key customer relationships and help close strategic opportunities with prospects. You are directly responsible for educating prospects, providing inspiring product demonstrations, and onboarding companies’ key stakeholders (HR Directors, CFOs, C-levels, Board of Directors,... ) as you make the transition from prospect to customer. 

At the same time, we expect you to understand, embrace and apply the Alan Smart & Soft selling method. This method stems from the concept that the prospect experience is an inseparable piece of the overall Alan customer experience. You are expected to make this experience pleasant, instructive and delightful by leveraging the most relevant messaging and materials (Smart) and by defining the high-touch strategy that suits best each prospect (Soft). 

We also expect you to look at the big picture and help us grow and improve as a company. For that, you’ll have to be real team players even beyond your role. You’ll be expected to challenge us to improve our product(s), our methods and our strategy, and get involved in other projects and initiatives relevant to growing our customer base. 

If you want to know more about how our Sales team works: https://blog.alan.eu/nos-commerciaux-ne-vendent-pas (in French)

⭐️ Your everyday ⭐️

Parts of the sales funnel you will address :

Account Executives at Alan operate as “full-stack” sales to drive deals, manage key customer relationships and help close strategic opportunities with prospects (companies from 200 to several thousand employees).  They are directly responsible for educating prospects, providing inspiring product demonstrations, and onboarding companies’ key stakeholders as they make the transition from prospect to customer.  

  • Prospection ✅, with support of Sales Associates

  • Closing ✅

  • Onboarding ✅

  • Account management ❌

Tool stack (main ones)

  • Prospection : Outreach, Linkedin Sales Navigator, Kasper, Lusha

  • CRM : Salesforce

  • Meetings : Google Meet & IRL

  • Coaching : Modjo

⭐️ Your profile ⭐️

You will be a good fit to join the Sales team at Alan if you:

  • Have at least 5 years of experience

  • Have strong background in B2B sales

  • Have previous experience with large companies (ideally selling to them) and understand how they operate

  • Have strong written & verbal communication skills in English and French. Being perfectly bilingual in Dutch/French is a strong plus.

  • Are highly organized with exceptional follow-up skills

  • Have strong analytical skills

  • Have empathy and are passionate about understanding and solving prospects' problems 

  • Have the ability to collaborate in a fast-paced team

  • Have a desire to learn fast and make an impact from day 1

Everything else is a plus. We care about having a diversity of experiences and backgrounds in our team.

🙌   Perks & Benefits

At Alan, we believe that being in good health is a basic need, and it starts with our employees. This is why Alaners are provided with a stimulating environment and perks ensuring they are happy, efficient and spend only high-quality time with co-workers. 

Therefore, we offer:

  • Fair rewards. Generous equity packages complement your base salary.

  • Flexible Office. Amazing office space at our HQ in Paris, sponsored co-working hubs in Ghent Brussels or Antwerp or a full-remote experience with home office equipment sponsorship, we want you to live where you’re the happiest.

  • All the tools you need. Top of the range equipment: Macbook Pro, keyboard, laptop stand, monitor, and Bose noise-canceling headphones.

  • Flexible vacation policy and flexible working hours. Organize your  time as you  wish.

  • Delightful healthcare insurance: Extremely comprehensive health insurance - 100% for you and your children, 90-100% for partners depending on your country (permanent contracts only).

  • Transport. You can use your own inspiration based on the Green mobility budget (for Senior level Alaners)

  • Learning & Training opportunities. A highly  flexible Training policy free books and budget to attend and speak at conferences if the opportunity arises.

  • Personal growth through coaching: At Alan, coaching isn't just a perk - it's core to who we are. Every Alaner is paired with a dedicated coach from day one, who helps maximize their impact, nurture engagement, and navigate Alan's values to develop their full potential. Learn more about our coaching culture.

  • Parental leave. Extended parental leave for all new parents.

Important note: we hire people, not roles.

If you're excited about this opportunity but don't check every box, we'd love to hear from you. Everyone, no matter how underrepresented, should feel free to apply as it can only bring learnings or success.

If you identify yourself as a woman: Did you know that research shows women often apply only when meeting 100% of requirements?

Remember, this is just a guide, not a checklist.

We'll be thrilled to receive your application!

🔖 Check out our About Alan and Career pages, as well as our Medium, blog and Glassdoor page for more info.

 - Transport. You can use your own inspiration based on the Green mobility budget (for Senior level Alaners)

 - Learning & Training opportunities. A highly  flexible Training policy free books and budget to attend and speak at conferences if the opportunity arises.

 - Personal growth through coaching: At Alan, coaching isn't just a perk - it's core to who we are.  - Parental leave. Extended parental leave for all new parents.

If you identify yourself as a woman: Did you know that research shows women often apply only when meeting 100% of requirements?

Remember, this is just a guide, not a checklist.

We'll be thrilled to receive your application!

🔖 Check out our About Alan https://alan.com/about and Career https://alan.com/careers pages, as well as our Medium https://medium.com/alan, blog https://blog.alan.com/ and Glassdoor page https://www.glassdoor.com/Overview/Working-at-Alan-EI_IE1696043.11,15.htm for more info.

jobs.title: Large Account Executive - Belgium 🇧🇪  (Dutch speaking)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
🐼 Who we are

You. Better. With Alan.

Alan's vision is to make prevention the new norm of care for all. Our mission is to help people live in good health to 100 while helping employers feel proud, turning health benefits from a cost centre into their most valuable investment.

We're building a vertically integrated health partner that seamlessly unites insurance and smart healthcare delivery into one system.

By connecting all aspects of care - private, public, and direct to consumer - we create the most member-centric healthcare experience. Through deep engagement, we empower everyone to overcome day-to-day health obstacles and live healthier lives.

We partner with 35K+ companies of all sizes, serving more than 950+ members, and have reached 680M+ in ARR.

Our team of 700+ people (still growing) operates across France 🇫🇷, Spain 🇪🇸, Belgium 🇧🇪, and Canada 🇨🇦.

🤘 How we do it ?

People joining Alan are often surprised and delighted by our innovative working method. We have a set of cultural values that guide our approach to work, such as:

🎯 What drives us — We're obsessed with helping our members live healthier

Mission is the Boss: long-term thinking, seeking our mission success above all else.

Member & customer-led: obsessively focused on solving members & customers problems and creating the most delightful experiences.


🏆 How we build excellence — We hire the best people and give them platform to succeed

Champions of excellence: extremely high standards and talent density.

Distributed ownership: accountable enlightened despots, everyone owns their decisions and results.

Radically transparent: all information is accessible and written-first, so everyone can make the best decisions asynchronously


🤝 How we grow together — We help each other improve through honest feedback and bold thinking

Optimistic alchemy: optimists who collaborate with genuine care and support teammates.

Empathetic challengers: direct, caring feedback combined with praises to help each other grow professionally

Bold & creative contrarians: think differently to achieve greatness, try new approaches


⚡ How we move fast — We fight complexity and focus on what matters most

Disciplined in execution: taking decisive actions with focus that compounds success over time

Fight for simplicity: only high impact processes, smart frugality

⭐️ Your mission

What is being an Large Account Executive at Alan and why do we need them?

As we continue to build our Sales team locally, we are looking for several Large Sales who target and close our largest prospects in both the private and public sector (companies with +200 up to 10000 employees). You can call it Sales, Business development... What is important for us is the mission:  help companies transition to a more personal, proactive and holistic health partner.

At Alan, Sales drive deals, manage key customer relationships and help close strategic opportunities with prospects. You are directly responsible for educating prospects, providing inspiring product demonstrations, and onboarding companies’ key stakeholders (HR Directors, CFOs, C-levels, Board of Directors,... ) as you make the transition from prospect to customer. 

At the same time, we expect you to understand, embrace and apply the Alan Smart & Soft selling method. This method stems from the concept that the prospect experience is an inseparable piece of the overall Alan customer experience. You are expected to make this experience pleasant, instructive and delightful by leveraging the most relevant messaging and materials (Smart) and by defining the high-touch strategy that suits best each prospect (Soft). 

We also expect you to look at the big picture and help us grow and improve as a company. For that, you’ll have to be real team players even beyond your role. You’ll be expected to challenge us to improve our product(s), our methods and our strategy, and get involved in other projects and initiatives relevant to growing our customer base. 

If you want to know more about how our Sales team works: https://blog.alan.eu/nos-commerciaux-ne-vendent-pas (in French).

⭐️ Your everyday⭐️

Parts of the sales funnel you will address :

Account Executives at Alan operate as “full-stack” sales to drive deals, manage key customer relationships and help close strategic opportunities with prospects (companies from 200 to several thousand employees). 

They are directly responsible for educating prospects, providing inspiring product demonstrations, and onboarding companies’ key stakeholders as they make the transition from prospect to customer:

  • Prospection ✅, with support of Sales Associates

  • Closing ✅

  • Onboarding ✅

  • Account management ❌

Tool stack (main ones)

  • Prospection : Outreach, Linkedin Sales Navigator, Kasper, Lusha

  • CRM : Salesforce

  • Meetings : Google Meet & IRL

  • Coaching : Modjo

  • They work closely with Sales associates

⭐️ Your profile ⭐️

You will be a good fit to join the Sales team at Alan if you:

  • Have at least 5 years of experience

  • Have strong background in B2B sales

  • Have previous experience with large companies (ideally selling to them) and understand how they operate

  • Have strong written & verbal communication skills in English and Dutch. Being perfectly bilingual in Dutch/French is a strong plus.

  • Are highly organized with exceptional follow-up skills

  • Have strong analytical skills

  • Have empathy and are passionate about understanding and solving prospects' problems 

  • Have the ability to collaborate in a fast-paced team

  • Have a desire to learn fast and make an impact from day 1

Everything else is a plus. We care about having a diversity of experiences and backgrounds in our team.

🙌   Perks & Benefits

At Alan, we believe that being in good health is a basic need, and it starts with our employees. This is why Alaners are provided with a stimulating environment and perks ensuring they are happy, efficient and spend only high-quality time with co-workers. 

Therefore, we offer:

  • Fair rewards. Generous equity packages complement your base salary.

  • Flexible Office. Amazing office space at our HQ in Paris, sponsored co-working hubs in Ghent Brussels or Antwerp or a full-remote experience with home office equipment sponsorship, we want you to live where you’re the happiest.

  • All the tools you need. Top of the range equipment: Macbook Pro, keyboard, laptop stand, monitor, and Bose noise-canceling headphones.

  • Flexible vacation policy and flexible working hours. Organize your  time as you  wish.

  • Delightful healthcare insurance: Extremely comprehensive health insurance - 100% for you and your children, 90-100% for partners depending on your country (permanent contracts only).

  • Transport. You can use your own inspiration based on the Green mobility budget (for Senior level Alaners)

  • Learning & Training opportunities. A highly  flexible Training policy free books and budget to attend and speak at conferences if the opportunity arises.

  • Personal growth through coaching: At Alan, coaching isn't just a perk - it's core to who we are. Every Alaner is paired with a dedicated coach from day one, who helps maximize their impact, nurture engagement, and navigate Alan's values to develop their full potential. Learn more about our coaching culture.

  • Parental leave. Extended parental leave for all new parents.

Important note: we hire people, not roles.

If you're excited about this opportunity but don't check every box, we'd love to hear from you. Everyone, no matter how underrepresented, should feel free to apply as it can only bring learnings or success.

If you identify yourself as a woman: Did you know that research shows women often apply only when meeting 100% of requirements?

Remember, this is just a guide, not a checklist.

We'll be thrilled to receive your application!

🔖 Check out our About Alan and Career pages, as well as our Medium, blog and Glassdoor page for more info.

jobs.title: CTO Founder Associate Intern
jobs.descriptionHtml:
🐼 Who we are

You. Better. With Alan.

Alan's vision is to make prevention the new norm of care for all. Our mission is to help people live in good health to 100 while helping employers feel proud, turning health benefits from a cost centre into their most valuable investment.

We're building a vertically integrated health partner that seamlessly unites insurance and smart healthcare delivery into one system.
