🙌 PERKS & BENEFITS https://alan.com/about/life-at-alan/a/perks

At Alan, we believe that being in good health is a basic need, and it starts with our employees. This is why Alaners are provided with a stimulating environment and perks ensuring they are happy, efficient and spend only high-quality time with co-workers.

Therefore, we offer:

 - Fair rewards. Generous equity packages complement your base salary, for permanent contracts only.

 - Flexible Office. Amazing office space at our HQ, sponsored co-working hubs or a full-remote experience with home office equipment sponsorship, we want you to live where you’re the happiest.

 - All the tools you need. Top of the range equipment: Macbook Pro, keyboard, laptop stand, monitor, and Bose noise-canceling headphones.

 - Flexible vacation policy and flexible working hours. Organize your time as you wish.

 - Delightful healthcare insurance: Extremely comprehensive health insurance - 100% for you and your children, 90-100% for partners depending on your country (permanent contracts only).

 - Transport. Country-specific commuter benefits.

 - Learning & Training opportunities. A highly flexible Training policy free books and budget to attend and speak at conferences if the opportunity arises.

 - Personal growth through coaching: At Alan, coaching isn't just a perk - it's core to who we are. Every Alaner is paired with a dedicated coach from day one, who helps maximize their impact, nurture engagement, and navigate Alan's values to develop their full potential. Learn more about our coaching culture https://alan.com/en/blog/discover-alan/a/alan-culture-excellence-through-coaching.

jobs.title: Care Expert - Belgium 🇧🇪
jobs.descriptionHtml:
🐼 Who we are

You. Better. With Alan.

Alan's vision is to make prevention the new norm of care for all. Our mission is to help people live in good health to 100 while helping employers feel proud, turning health benefits from a cost centre into their most valuable investment.

We're building a vertically integrated health partner that seamlessly unites insurance and smart healthcare delivery into one system.

By connecting all aspects of care - private, public, and direct to consumer - we create the most member-centric healthcare experience. Through deep engagement, we empower everyone to overcome day-to-day health obstacles and live healthier lives.

We partner with 35K+ companies of all sizes, serving more than 950+ members, and have reached 680M+ in ARR.

Our team of 700+ people (still growing) operates across France 🇫🇷, Spain 🇪🇸, Belgium 🇧🇪, and Canada 🇨🇦.

⭐️ YOUR MISSION ⭐️


Taking care of our clients is at the heart of our business. Our User Care Experts are on the frontline to answer our members (via chat, email and phone), solve their problems and offer an amazing customer experience.

  • Helping our members - Your first mission will be to deal with our members' requests in a meaningful, delightful and timely manner. Your goal is to be transparent, accurate, clear and helpful to our members. After all, we are dealing with a crucial subject — their health — and we are committed to offering them exceptional service.

  • Improving Alan - As a User Care Expert, you’ll also have the opportunity to work on projects next to answering our members. The focus of these projects depends on your interest and background.  We expect you to help us implement better processes and tools, and to contribute to improving our product. This will involve analysing what you see, identifying areas for improvement and making suggestions on what we can do better.

  • Grow and learn - At Alan, we are dedicated to learn as much as we can. It's not every day that you can join a fast-growing company, tackling an obsolete sector by putting the member at the heart of it all. You will become an expert in healthcare and insurance, and help new members of the great healthcare team.

  • Pioneering - The 🇧🇪 care team today is still relatively small. However, we have bold ambitions and will grow quickly. You will be involved in building, nurturing and enhancing our care team on a daily basis.

 

⭐️ JOIN THE 🇧🇪 CARE TEAM ⭐️ 

You will be a good fit for the role if you:

  • Have 2+ years of experience in: a customer-support role; or education; or communication

  • Are bilingual English + Dutch ❗️

  • Have a passion for caring for members, and solving their problems

  • Love written communication

  • Are comfortable with computers and technology in general

  • Have a very empathetic mindset

  • Are motivated and entrepreneurial

  • Have an enthusiasm for teamwork, learning and teaching  

  • Bonus points if you know how the Belgian healthcare system works — we will teach you if you don’t. 😉  

Everything else you know is a plus! We want our team to be made up of a diversity of experiences and backgrounds.

Good to know:

  • For this opportunity, we are aiming to hire full time and within the A2-C0 level range.

  • Insurance is a regulated profession and requires all agents in contact with the public to pass a basic insurance knowledge test within their first year of exercise (some exemptions apply). This exam is covered by Alan ; reach out to us to know more!

🙌 Perks & Benefits

At Alan, we believe that being in good health is a basic need, and it starts with our employees. This is why Alaners are provided with a stimulating environment and perks ensuring they are happy, efficient and spend only high-quality time with co-workers. 
Therefore, we offer:

  • Fair rewards. Generous equity packages complement your base salary.

  • Flexible Office. Amazing office space at our HQ in Paris, sponsored co-working hubs in Ghent Brussels or Antwerp or a full-remote experience with home office equipment sponsorship, we want you to live where you’re the happiest.

  • All the tools you need. Top of the range equipment: MacBook Pro, keyboard, laptop stand, monitor, and Bose noise-canceling headphones.

  • Flexible vacation policy and flexible working hours. Organize your time as you wish.

  • Delightful healthcare insurance: Extremely comprehensive health insurance - 100% for you and your children, 90-100% for partners depending on your country (permanent contracts only).

  • Transport. You can use your own inspiration based on the Green mobility budget (for Senior level Alaners)

  • Learning & Training opportunities. A highly flexible Training policy, free books and budget to attend and speak at conferences if the opportunity arises.

  • Personal growth through coaching: At Alan, coaching isn't just a perk - it's core to who we are. Every Alaner is paired with a dedicated coach from day one, who helps maximize their impact, nurture engagement, and navigate Alan's values to develop their full potential. Learn more about our coaching culture.

  • Parental leave. Extended parental leave for all new parents.

Important note: we hire people, not roles.

If you're excited about this opportunity but don't check every box, we'd love to hear from you. Everyone, no matter how underrepresented, should feel free to apply as it can only bring learnings or success.

If you identify yourself as a woman: Did you know that research shows women often apply only when meeting 100% of requirements?

Remember, this is just a guide, not a checklist.

We'll be thrilled to receive your application!

🔖 Check out our About Alan and Career pages, as well as our Medium, blog and Glassdoor page for more info.

You. Better. With Alan.

Alan's vision is to make prevention the new norm of care for all. Our mission is to help people live in good health to 100 while helping employers feel proud, turning health benefits from a cost centre into their most valuable investment.

We're building a vertically integrated health partner that seamlessly unites insurance and smart healthcare delivery into one system.

By connecting all aspects of care - private, public, and direct to consumer - we create the most member-centric healthcare experience. Through deep engagement, we empower everyone to overcome day-to-day health obstacles and live healthier lives.

We partner with 35K+ companies of all sizes, serving more than 900K+ members, and have reached €700M+ in ARR.

Our team of 650+ people (still growing) operates across France 🇫🇷, Spain 🇪🇸, Belgium 🇧🇪, and Canada 🇨🇦.

🤘 How we do it ?

People joining Alan are always surprised and delighted by our innovative working method. We have a set of cultural values that guide our approach to work, such as:

🎯 What drives us — We're obsessed with helping our members live healthier

  1. Mission is the Boss: long-term thinking, seeking our mission success above all else.

  2. Member & customer-led: obsessively focused on solving members & customers problems and creating the most delightful experiences.

🏆 How we build excellence — We hire the best people and give them platform to succeed

  1. Champions of excellence: extremely high standards and talent density.

  2. Distributed ownership: accountable enlightened despots, everyone owns their decisions and results.

  3. Radically transparent: all information is accessible and written-first, so everyone can make the best decisions asynchronously

🤝 How we grow together — We help each other improve through honest feedback and bold thinking

  1. Optimistic alchemy: optimists who collaborate with genuine care and support teammates.

  2. Empathetic challengers: direct, caring feedback combined with praises to help each other grow professionally

  3. Bold & creative contrarians: think differently to achieve greatness, try new approaches

⚡ How we move fast — We fight complexity and focus on what matters most

  1. Disciplined in execution: taking decisive actions with focus that compounds success over time

  2. Fight for simplicity: only high impact processes, smart frugality

⭐️ The Segment Owner job ⭐️

Our self-serve business is a strategic acquisition channel and serves small companies, freelancers and retirees.

Self-serve segment owners are accountable for one of the segments. This is a highly strategic role, responsible for defining and executing the complete go-to-market strategy for the segment.

⭐️ Your missions ⭐️

Strategic planning & execution

  • Segment strategy: identify growth bottlenecks and new market opportunities, identify priority areas for both short-term (weekly/monthly/quarterly) and long-term (2-3 year) horizons

  • Target setting: set bottom-up targets

  • Performance monitoring: deliver weekly segment performance updates including target achievement, ARR, churn and gross profit metrics

Product marketing & channel enablement

  • Market intelligence: provide deep insights on customer personas, market dynamics, pain points and customer needs

  • Maintain a continuous customer pulse through regular customer interviews and Sales call reviews to inform hypotheses and prioritization

  • Value proposition: craft a differentiated positioning and competitive advantages to accelerate customer acquisition

  • Proactively empower channel owners across paid advertising, SEO, partnerships and referral programs

  • Evaluate and provide feedback on channel proposals and initiatives

  • Act as an accelerator for channel owners, providing rapid deep-dive support (e.g., SEA optimization, conversion analysis…), as well as building and deploying segment-specific assets (email campaigns, landing pages, lead magnet…)

Product & Data

  • Surface segment-specific feature requirements and tracking/analytics needs

  • Continuously improve performance dashboards, leveraging AI & Data team assistance

  • Contribute to cross-functional topics (e.g., legal setup considerations, guarantee/renewal inputs) and partner with business stakeholders to ensure segment profitability.

⭐ Is it you we’re looking for? ⭐️

You may be a great fit at Alan if you have/are:

  • At least 5 years of experience in product marketing

  • An experience in strategic business development and/or go-to-market is a plus

  • Full French and English Fluency (written and spoken)

  • Strong analytical skills. Comfortable building dashboards and using AI assistants for data analysis.

  • Entrepreneurial & growth mindset: self-starter who thrives in a fast-moving environment

  • Exposure to pricing/packaging and unit economics; ability to reason about profitability.

  • Collaborative and able to influence cross-functional teams

  • Experience working with small business and individual customer segments is a plus

For this opportunity, we are aiming to hire within the D-F level range of our salary grid.

🙌 Perks & Benefits

At Alan, we believe that being in good health is a basic need, and it starts with our employees. This is why Alaners are provided with a stimulating environment and perks ensuring they are happy, efficient and spend only high-quality time with co-workers.

Therefore, we offer:

  • Fair rewards. Generous equity packages complement your base salary, for permanent contracts only.

  • Flexible Office. Amazing office space at our HQ, sponsored co-working hubs or a full-remote experience with home office equipment sponsorship, we want you to live where you’re the happiest.

  • All the tools you need. Top of the range equipment: Macbook Pro, keyboard, laptop stand, monitor, and Bose noise-canceling headphones.

  • Flexible vacation policy and flexible working hours. Organize your time as you wish.

  • Delightful healthcare insurance: Extremely comprehensive health insurance - 100% for you and your children, 90-100% for partners depending on your country (permanent contracts only).

  • Transport. Country-specific commuter benefits.

  • Learning & Training opportunities. A highly flexible Training policy free books and budget to attend and speak at conferences if the opportunity arises.

  • Personal growth through coaching: At Alan, coaching isn't just a perk - it's core to who we are. Every Alaner is paired with a dedicated coach from day one, who helps maximize their impact, nurture engagement, and navigate Alan's values to develop their full potential. Learn more about our coaching culture.

  • Parental leave. Extended parental leave for all new parents, for permanent contracts only.

Important note: we hire people, not roles.

If you're excited about this opportunity but don't check every box, we'd love to hear from you. Everyone, no matter how underrepresented, should feel free to apply as it can only bring learnings or success.

If you identify yourself as a woman: Did you know that research shows women often apply only when meeting 100% of requirements?

Remember, this is just a guide, not a checklist.

We'll be thrilled to receive your application!

🔖 Check out our About Alan and Career pages, as well as our Medium, blog and Glassdoor page for more info.

jobs.title: Senior Product Marketer - Belgian Market
jobs.descriptionHtml:
🐼 Who we are

You. Better. With Alan.

Alan's vision is to make prevention the new norm of care for all. Our mission is to help people live in good health to 100 while helping employers feel proud, turning health benefits from a cost centre into their most valuable investment.

We're building a vertically integrated health partner that seamlessly unites insurance and smart healthcare delivery into one system.

By connecting all aspects of care - private, public, and direct to consumer - we create the most member-centric healthcare experience. Through deep engagement, we empower everyone to overcome day-to-day health obstacles and live healthier lives.

We partner with 35K+ companies of all sizes, serving more than 950K+ members, and have reached 680M+ in ARR.

Our team of 700+ people (still growing) operates across France 🇫🇷, Spain 🇪🇸, Belgium 🇧🇪, and Canada 🇨🇦.

⭐️ The Product Marketer job ⭐️

⭐️ Your Mission ⭐️

Your mission as a Senior Product Marketer is to work closely with product and business teams to ensure the successful go to market of business segments. You’ll be part of the Belgium team, closely working with Alan global marketing & product teams.

Your mission is 3-fold:

  1. You put a strong focus on our value proposition and how we pitch in sales conversations: you look for what does not work and craft solutions together with business teams (sales, account management, sales enablement).

  2. You have a deep understanding of our business segment and persona’s through market & competitive intelligence and transfer this knowledge to product and business teams.

  3. You are obsessed about our product: you organize and funnel back product feedback from the field to influence the product roadmap and iterate on the pitch.

Examples of tasks you will own to achieve your mission:

  • Write the value proposition and pitch for a new segment (ex: blue collars) in close collaboration with sales teams.

  • Test your value proposition and pitch by joining sales meetings and full deal cycles, from very small companies to the largest Belgian corporations.

  • Create the supporting marketing materials.

  • Craft and execute on creative ideas to unblock sales cycles (e.g. Organize a wellbeing workshop with decision makers).

  • Scale what you learn from specific cycles to other commercial teams through trainings.

  • Gather product feedback from commercial teams and analyse what to prioritize in the product roadmap to unlock the most deals.

You will be the go-to person when it comes to marketing for the Belgian market, building bridges between marketing, sales and product. You will have a 360 view of the business and have the opportunity to shape how we go to market, challenge existing play books and build new ones.

⭐️ Is it you we are looking for ? ⭐️

Experience & background

  • Minimum 6 years of experience in Product Marketing, Product Manager or Brand. Preferably in B2B SaaS.

  • Fluency in English and Dutch

  • Experience in defining, positioning and launching products or services.

  • Experience in working in or with commercial organisations or go to market teams.

Skills

  • You thrive in fast-paced environments and have a strong business sense.

  • Strong generalist, with can-do mindset & hands on attitude to problem-solving.

  • Natural talent in storytelling and copywriting.

  • High level of empathy. You are obsessed about ‘customer experience’.

  • Appetite for both strategic thinking and hands-on work (ex: you are ok with content creation).

  • Analytical mind: ability to frame solutions to ill define or ambiguous problems. Ability to simplify complex content.

  • You are able to rally stakeholders from diverse teams and seniority levels around a common goal.

  • Being trilingual is a strong asset


For this opportunity, we are aiming to hire within the C1-E level range.

🙌 Perks & Benefits

At Alan, we believe that being in good health is a basic need, and it starts with our employees. This is why Alaners are provided with a stimulating environment and perks ensuring they are happy, efficient and spend only high-quality time with co-workers.

Therefore, we offer:

  • Fair rewards. Generous equity packages complement your base salary.

  • Flexible Office. Amazing office space at our HQ in Paris, sponsored co-working hubs in Ghent Brussels or Antwerp or a full-remote experience with home office equipment sponsorship, we want you to live where you’re the happiest.

  • All the tools you need. Top of the range equipment: Macbook Pro, keyboard, laptop stand, monitor, and Bose noise-canceling headphones.

  • Flexible vacation policy and flexible working hours. organize your time as you wish.

  • Delightful healthcare insurance. Extremely comprehensive health insurance - 100% of the contribution covered by Alan for you and your family.

  • Transport. You can use your own inspiration based on the Green mobility budget (for Senior level Alaners).

  • Learning & Training opportunities. A highly flexible Training policy free books and budget to attend and speak at conferences if the opportunity arises.

  • Personal growth through coaching: At Alan, coaching isn't just a perk - ****it's core to who we are. Every Alaner is paired with a dedicated coach from day one, who helps maximize their impact, nurture engagement, and navigate Alan's values to develop their full potential. Learn more about our coaching culture.

  • Parental leave. Extended parental leave for all new parents.

Important note: we hire people, not roles.

If you're excited about this opportunity but don't check every box, we'd love to hear from you. Everyone, no matter how underrepresented, should feel free to apply as it can only bring learnings or success.

If you identify yourself as a woman: Did you know that research shows women often apply only when meeting 100% of requirements?

Remember, this is just a guide, not a checklist. We'll be thrilled to receive your application!

🔖 Check out our About Alan and Career pages, as well as our Medium, blog and Glassdoor page for more info.

  2. Empathetic challengers: direct, caring feedback combined with praises to help each other grow professionally

  3. Bold & creative contrarians: think differently to achieve greatness, try new approaches

⚡ How we move fast — We fight complexity and focus on what matters most

  1. Disciplined in execution: taking decisive actions with focus that compounds success over time

  2. Fight for simplicity: only high impact processes, smart frugality

⭐️ The Insurance Team ⭐️

Being part of Alan's insurance community is a great opportunity to have a significant impact on people's health and wellbeing in our multiple countries of operation.

  • We are at the heart of Alan’s mission, bringing to the team our technical leadership and expertise on healthcare and death & disability insurance.

  • We work hand in hand with our data scientists, designers, engineers and product managers to build the most differentiating products and provide a delightful experience at a fair price.

  • We build and manage offers for large companies and public institutions with our sales and account management teams.

  • We make sure our portfolio is closely monitored and risks are effectively managed.

  • We also manage our capital, steer our reinsurance strategy and maintain a trusting relationship with our insurance regulators.

⭐️ Your role ⭐️ ️

As Alan’s Risk Expert, you will be in charge of providing Alan with automated and scalable risk assessment tools:

  • Risk modeling

    • You will be in charge of strengthening and automating the building our Solvency 2 balance sheet and capital requirements projections, covering both health, death and disability business lines

    • You will model new risks when they arise (new insurance products, branches, international, investment etc.)

    • You will challenge our risk appetite, propose new relevant risk metrics and build tools to monitor them

    • You will support the board meetings preparation and communication with investors regarding capital evolution and market risks

  • Regulatory

    • You will scale and automate the production of our regulatory quantitative reporting and contribute to our narrative (SFCR, RSR) and ORSA reports

    • You will support our discussions with supervisors

    • You will assist the assessment of international opportunities and help prepare the opening of new countries

  • Capital management

    • You will make proposals to improve our capital management in the 4 countries Alan is present

    • You will manage our reinsurance strategy, to find an optimum between solvency and profitability, negotiating with reinsurance partners, and analyze reinsurance reporting

  • Team Growth

    • You will create processes and resources to strengthen the team’s ability to understand our risk and capital constraints

    • You will support the identification and hiring of new talents for the Insurance and Risk teams.

⭐️ Is it you we’re looking for? ⭐️

You would thrive in this role if you:

  • Have solid expertise of the Solvency 2 regulatory framework, especially for S2 accounting, with knowledge of Health, Life and Market risks as a bonus

  • Are fluent in English and have written fluency in French for regulatory interactions

  • Possess excellent problem-solving and analytical skills, including data analysis capabilities

  • Can automate processes and build new tools, with programming skills being a plus

  • Bring rigor and reliability to reporting production while working independently in a fast-paced environment

  • Have strong communication skills for effective interaction with internal and external stakeholders

  • Are confident learning new tools, technologies, and methodologies with creative problem-solving approaches

🙌 Perks & Benefits

At Alan, we believe that being in good health is a basic need, and it starts with our employees. This is why Alaners are provided with a stimulating environment and perks ensuring they are happy, efficient and spend only high-quality time with co-workers.

Therefore, we offer:

  • Fair rewards. Generous equity packages complement your base salary.

  • Flexible Office. Amazing office space at our HQ, sponsored co-working hubs or a full-remote experience with home office equipment sponsorship, we want you to live where you’re the happiest.

  • All the tools you need. Top of the range equipment: Macbook Pro, keyboard, laptop stand, monitor, and Bose noise-canceling headphones.

  • Flexible vacation policy and flexible working hours. organize your time as you wish.

  • Delightful healthcare insurance: Extremely comprehensive health insurance - 100% for you and your children, 90-100% for partners depending on your country (permanent contracts only).

  • Transport. Country-specific commuter benefits.

  • Learning & Training opportunities. A highly flexible Training policy free books and budget to attend and speak at conferences if the opportunity arises.

  • Personal growth through coaching: At Alan, coaching isn't just a perk - ****it's core to who we are. Every Alaner is paired with a dedicated coach from day one, who helps maximize their impact, nurture engagement, and navigate Alan's values to develop their full potential. Learn more about our coaching culture.

  • Parental leave. Extended parental leave for all new parents.

Important note: we hire people, not roles.

jobs.descriptionPlain:
🐼 WHO WE ARE

You. Better. With Alan.

Alan's vision is to make prevention the new norm of care for all. Our mission is to help people live in good health to 100 while helping employers feel proud, turning health benefits from a cost centre into their most valuable investment.

We're building a vertically integrated health partner that seamlessly unites insurance and smart healthcare delivery into one system.

By connecting all aspects of care - private, public, and direct to consumer - we create the most member-centric healthcare experience. Through deep engagement, we empower everyone to overcome day-to-day health obstacles and live healthier lives.

We partner with 35K+ companies of all sizes, serving more than 950K+ members, and have reached 680M+ in ARR.

Our team of 700+ people (still growing) operates across France 🇫🇷, Spain 🇪🇸, Belgium 🇧🇪, and Canada 🇨🇦.


🤘 HOW WE DO IT ?

People joining Alan are always surprised and delighted by our innovative working method. We have a set of cultural values https://alan.com/about/company-culture that guide our approach to work, such as:

🎯 What drives us — We're obsessed with helping our members live healthier

 1. Mission is the Boss: long-term thinking, seeking our mission success above all else.

 2. Member & customer-led: obsessively focused on solving members & customers problems and creating the most delightful experiences.

🏆 How we build excellence — We hire the best people and give them platform to succeed

 1. Champions of excellence: extremely high standards and talent density.

 2. Distributed ownership: accountable enlightened despots, everyone owns their decisions and results.

 3. Radically transparent: all information is accessible and written-first, so everyone can make the best decisions asynchronously

🤝 How we grow together — We help each other improve through honest feedback and bold thinking

 1. Optimistic alchemy: optimists who collaborate with genuine care and support teammates.

 2. Empathetic challengers: direct, caring feedback combined with praises to help each other grow professionally

 3. Bold & creative contrarians: think differently to achieve greatness, try new approaches

⚡ How we move fast — We fight complexity and focus on what matters most

 1. Disciplined in execution: taking decisive actions with focus that compounds success over time

 2. Fight for simplicity: only high impact processes, smart frugality


⭐️ THE INSURANCE TEAM ⭐️

Being part of Alan's insurance community is a great opportunity to have a significant impact on people's health and wellbeing in our multiple countries of operation.

 - We are at the heart of Alan’s mission, bringing to the team our technical leadership and expertise on healthcare and death & disability insurance.

 - We work hand in hand with our data scientists, designers, engineers and product managers to build the most differentiating products and provide a delightful experience at a fair price.

 - We build and manage offers for large companies and public institutions with our sales and account management teams.

 - We make sure our portfolio is closely monitored and risks are effectively managed.

 - We also manage our capital, steer our reinsurance strategy and maintain a trusting relationship with our insurance regulators.


⭐️ YOUR ROLE ⭐️ ️

As Alan’s Risk Expert, you will be in charge of providing Alan with automated and scalable risk assessment tools:

 - Risk modeling
   
   - You will be in charge of strengthening and automating the building our Solvency 2 balance sheet and capital requirements projections, covering both health, death and disability business lines
   
   - You will model new risks when they arise (new insurance products, branches, international, investment etc.)
   
   - You will challenge our risk appetite, propose new relevant risk metrics and build tools to monitor them
   
   - You will support the board meetings preparation and communication with investors regarding capital evolution and market risks

 - Regulatory
   
   - You will scale and automate the production of our regulatory quantitative reporting and contribute to our narrative (SFCR, RSR) and ORSA reports
   
   - You will support our discussions with supervisors
   
   - You will assist the assessment of international opportunities and help prepare the opening of new countries

 - Capital management
   
   - You will make proposals to improve our capital management in the 4 countries Alan is present
   
   - You will manage our reinsurance strategy, to find an optimum between solvency and profitability, negotiating with reinsurance partners, and analyze reinsurance reporting

 - Team Growth
   
   - You will create processes and resources to strengthen the team’s ability to understand our risk and capital constraints
   
   - You will support the identification and hiring of new talents for the Insurance and Risk teams.


⭐️ IS IT YOU WE’RE LOOKING FOR? ⭐️

You would thrive in this role if you:

 - Have solid expertise of the Solvency 2 regulatory framework, especially for S2 accounting, with knowledge of Health, Life and Market risks as a bonus

 - Are fluent in English and have written fluency in French for regulatory interactions

 - Possess excellent problem-solving and analytical skills, including data analysis capabilities

 - Can automate processes and build new tools, with programming skills being a plus

 - Bring rigor and reliability to reporting production while working independently in a fast-paced environment

 - Have strong communication skills for effective interaction with internal and external stakeholders

 - Are confident learning new tools, technologies, and methodologies with creative problem-solving approaches


🙌 PERKS & BENEFITS https://alan.com/about/life-at-alan/a/perks

At Alan, we believe that being in good health is a basic need, and it starts with our employees. This is why Alaners are provided with a stimulating environment and perks ensuring they are happy, efficient and spend only high-quality time with co-workers.

Therefore, we offer:

 - Fair rewards. Generous equity packages complement your base salary.

 - Flexible Office. Amazing office space at our HQ, sponsored co-working hubs or a full-remote experience with home office equipment sponsorship, we want you to live where you’re the happiest.

 - All the tools you need. Top of the range equipment: Macbook Pro, keyboard, laptop stand, monitor, and Bose noise-canceling headphones.

 - Flexible vacation policy and flexible working hours. organize your time as you wish.

 - Delightful healthcare insurance: Extremely comprehensive health insurance - 100% for you and your children, 90-100% for partners depending on your country (permanent contracts only).

 - Transport. Country-specific commuter benefits.

 - Learning & Training opportunities. A highly flexible Training policy free books and budget to attend and speak at conferences if the opportunity arises.

 - Personal growth through coaching: At Alan, coaching isn't just a perk - ****it's core to who we are. Every Alaner is paired with a dedicated coach from day one, who helps maximize their impact, nurture engagement, and navigate Alan's values to develop their full potential. Learn more about our coaching culture https://alan.com/en/blog/discover-alan/a/alan-culture-excellence-through-coaching.

 - Parental leave. Extended parental leave for all new parents.


IMPORTANT NOTE: WE HIRE PEOPLE, NOT ROLES.

If you're excited about this opportunity but don't check every box, we'd love to hear from you. Everyone, no matter how underrepresented, should feel free to apply as it can only bring learnings or success.

If you identify yourself as a woman: Did you know that research shows women often apply only when meeting 100% of requirements?

Remember, this is just a guide, not a checklist.

We'll be thrilled to receive your application!

🔖 Check out our About Alan https://alan.com/about and Career https://alan.com/careers pages, as well as our Medium https://medium.com/alan, blog https://blog.alan.com/ and Glassdoor page https://www.glassdoor.com/Overview/Working-at-Alan-EI_IE1696043.11,15.htm for more info.

jobs.title: Partnership Development - Belgium
jobs.descriptionHtml:
🐼 Who we are

You. Better. With Alan.

Alan's vision is to make prevention the new norm of care for all. Our mission is to help people live in good health to 100 while helping employers feel proud, turning health benefits from a cost centre into their most valuable investment.

We're building a vertically integrated health partner that seamlessly unites insurance and smart healthcare delivery into one system.

By connecting all aspects of care - private, public, and direct to consumer - we create the most member-centric healthcare experience. Through deep engagement, we empower everyone to overcome day-to-day health obstacles and live healthier lives.

We partner with 35K+ companies of all sizes, serving more than 950K+ members, and have reached 680M+ in ARR.

Our team of 700+ people (still growing) operates across France 🇫🇷, Spain 🇪🇸, Belgium 🇧🇪, and Canada 🇨🇦.

⭐️ The Partnership Development job ⭐️

We are looking for an experienced Partnership Developer to join our team in Belgium. The core purpose of this role is to open doors to Sales by strengthening Alan's reputation and awareness amongst the HR community and generating business opportunities through targeted field initiatives.

As the sole partnership manager on the ground representing Alan in Belgium, you will be shaping our strategy and representing Alan on a daily basis in key business networks.

Here is how your key outcomes will look like:

  1. Execute high-impact field events: Organize and run strategic events targeting HR professionals, ensuring measurable business outcomes.

  2. Build and maintain HR network relationships: Establish and nurture key partnerships with HR influencers, business federations leaders and decision-makers.

  3. Increase Alan’s brand presence in the Belgian HR ecosystem: Drive engagement and visibility by creating content for sales, and establishing partnerships.

  4. Generate business opportunities for sales: Work closely with the sales team to convert brand awareness into leads and pipeline growth.

  5. Develop localized communication content: Create compelling event materials, messaging, and communications tailored to the Belgian HR audience.

  6. Establish Alan as a thought leader: Position Alan within the HR community through strategic collaborations, speaking engagements, and industry recognition.

⭐ Is it you we’re looking for?

We're looking for someone who combines partnership expertise with strategic networking abilities, has a deep understanding of the HR ecosystem, and can autonomously drive brand awareness and lead generation in complex B2B landscapes.

The ideal candidate will bring versatility with fundamentals in Sales and Marketing, in addition to proven event management experience. They should be excited about scaling-up Alan's presence in Belgium, helping us develop our thought leadership in the HR community while effectively converting brand visibility into tangible business opportunities for our sales team.

You may be a great fit at Alan if you have/are:

  • 5+ experience in Partnership Management, Sales or Marketing

  • Full English Fluency (written and spoken)

  • Native-level of Dutch

  • A previous experience in building partnerships

  • A strong ability to plan, coordinate and measure events impact and ROI

  • Excellent networking and pitching skills with C-levels and HR audiences

  • Strong communication and content creation skills (copywriting, visual design)

  • Strong ownership and accountability in delivering results

  • Collaborative and able to influence cross-functional teams


For this opportunity, we are aiming to hire within the C1-E level range.

 

🙌 Perks & Benefits

At Alan, we believe that being in good health is a basic need, and it starts with our employees. This is why Alaners are provided with a stimulating environment and perks ensuring they are happy, efficient and spend only high-quality time with co-workers.

Therefore, we offer:

  • Fair rewards. Generous equity packages complement your base salary.

  • Flexible Office. Amazing office space at our HQ in Paris, sponsored co-working hubs in Ghent Brussels or Antwerp or a full-remote experience with home office equipment sponsorship, we want you to live where you’re the happiest.

  • All the tools you need. Top of the range equipment: Macbook Pro, keyboard, laptop stand, monitor, and Bose noise-canceling headphones.

  • Flexible vacation policy and flexible working hours. organize your time as you wish.

  • Delightful healthcare insurance. Extremely comprehensive health insurance - 100% of the contribution covered by Alan for you and your family.

  • Transport. You can use your own inspiration based on the Green mobility budget (for Senior level Alaners).

  • Learning & Training opportunities. A highly flexible Training policy free books and budget to attend and speak at conferences if the opportunity arises.

  • Personal growth through coaching: At Alan, coaching isn't just a perk - ****it's core to who we are. Every Alaner is paired with a dedicated coach from day one, who helps maximize their impact, nurture engagement, and navigate Alan's values to develop their full potential. Learn more about our coaching culture.

  • Parental leave. Extended parental leave for all new parents.

Important note: we hire people, not roles.

If you're excited about this opportunity but don't check every box, we'd love to hear from you. Everyone, no matter how underrepresented, should feel free to apply as it can only bring learnings or success.

If you identify yourself as a woman: Did you know that research shows women often apply only when meeting 100% of requirements?

Remember, this is just a guide, not a checklist. We'll be thrilled to receive your application!

🔖 Check out our About Alan and Career pages, as well as our Medium, blog and Glassdoor page for more info.

Being part of Alan's insurance community is a great opportunity to have a significant impact on people's health and wellbeing in our multiple countries of operation.

  • We are at the heart of Alan’s mission, bringing to the team our technical leadership and expertise on healthcare and death & disability insurance.

  • We work hand in hand with our data scientists, designers, engineers and product managers to build the most differentiating products and provide a delightful experience at a fair price.

  • We make sure our portfolio is closely monitored and risks are effectively managed.

  • We also manage our capital, steer our reinsurance strategy and maintain a trusting relationship with our insurance regulators.

️ ⭐️ The Insurance Expert role in Spain ⭐️

The role of an Insurance Expert at Alan is to:

  • Monitor the business and the risks,

  • Help the rest of the team understand the subtleties of healthcare and insurance.

Being an Insurance Expert at Alan in Spain means:

  • Being part of a small and talented team currently working on delivering the best experience to our members

  • Recent missions include:

    • Defining the pricing and re-pricing strategy of the different products

    • Improving margin monitoring

    • Collaborating with the Key Account Managers team to make sure they are equipped with the right tools to deliver the best experience to their customers

    • Analyzing the profitability of the portfolio and suggesting action points

  • Being part of an insurance community at the global level, with an impact on our organization, hiring and training across multiple countries.

⭐️ Is it you we’re looking for? ⭐️

You may be a great fit for the role if:

  • You have at least 3+ years of experience in health insurance

  • You are fluent in English

  • Knowledge of the trends from the sector, of the pricing/repricing business decisions and market practices

  • You combine a quantitative background (statistics, actuarial sciences) with an experience in insurance products and business

  • You are able to navigate and synthesize technical, data, business and legal questions related to insurance

  • You have a builder mindset, continuously identifying opportunities to scale and optimize processes and systems

  • You are willing to deeply change the insurance and healthcare industry and challenge the status quo

It would be even better if:

  • You are fluent in Spanish or willing to learn Spanish

  • You have experience coordinating with teams based in another country

  • You have connections and a deep understanding of the Spanish health insurance market

At Alan, we believe that being in good health is a basic need, and it starts with our employees. This is why Alaners are provided with a stimulating environment and perks ensuring they are happy, efficient and spend only high-quality time with co-workers.

  • All the tools you need. Top of the range equipment: Macbook Pro, keyboard, laptop stand, monitor, and Bose noise-canceling headphones.

  • Flexible vacation policy and flexible working hours. organize your time as you wish.

  • Delightful healthcare insurance: Extremely comprehensive health insurance - 100% for you and your children, 90-100% for partners depending on your country (permanent contracts only).

  • Transport. Country-specific commuter benefits.

  • Learning & Training opportunities. A highly flexible Training policy free books and budget to attend and speak at conferences if the opportunity arises.

  • Personal growth through coaching: At Alan, coaching isn't just a perk - ****it's core to who we are. Every Alaner is paired with a dedicated coach from day one, who helps maximize their impact, nurture engagement, and navigate Alan's values to develop their full potential. Learn more about our coaching culture.

  • Parental leave. Extended parental leave for all new parents.

Important note: we hire people, not roles.

🔖 Check out our About Alan https://alan.com/about and Career https://alan.com/careers pages, as well as our Medium https://medium.com/alan, blog https://blog.alan.com/ and Glassdoor page https://www.glassdoor.com/Overview/Working-at-Alan-EI_IE1696043.11,15.htm for more info.

jobs.title: Product Designer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
🐼 Who we are

You. Better. With Alan.

Alan's vision is to make prevention the new norm of care for all. Our mission is to help people live in good health to 100 while helping employers feel proud, turning health benefits from a cost centre into their most valuable investment.

We're building a vertically integrated health partner that seamlessly unites insurance and smart healthcare delivery into one system.

By connecting all aspects of care - private, public, and direct to consumer - we create the most member-centric healthcare experience. Through deep engagement, we empower everyone to overcome day-to-day health obstacles and live healthier lives.

We partner with 35K+ companies of all sizes, serving more than 950K+ members, and have reached 680M+ in ARR.

Our team of 700+ people (still growing) operates across France 🇫🇷, Spain 🇪🇸, Belgium 🇧🇪, and Canada 🇨🇦

🤘 How we do it ?

People joining Alan are always surprised and delighted by our innovative working method. We have a set of cultural values that guide our approach to work, such as:

🎯 What drives us — We're obsessed with helping our members live healthier

  1. Mission is the Boss: long-term thinking, seeking our mission success above all else.

  2. Member & customer-led: obsessively focused on solving members & customers problems and creating the most delightful experiences.

🏆 How we build excellence — We hire the best people and give them platform to succeed

  1. Champions of excellence: extremely high standards and talent density.

  2. Distributed ownership: accountable enlightened despots, everyone owns their decisions and results.

  3. Radically transparent: all information is accessible and written-first, so everyone can make the best decisions asynchronously

🤝 How we grow together — We help each other improve through honest feedback and bold thinking

  1. Optimistic alchemy: optimists who collaborate with genuine care and support teammates.

  2. Empathetic challengers: direct, caring feedback combined with praises to help each other grow professionally

  3. Bold & creative contrarians: think differently to achieve greatness, try new approaches

⚡ How we move fast — We fight complexity and focus on what matters most

  1. Disciplined in execution: taking decisive actions with focus that compounds success over time

  2. Fight for simplicity: only high impact processes, smart frugality

👉 About the role

Product designers at Alan are at the forefront of building our product(s), taking them from inception to completion. They work hand in hand with product managers, researchers, and engineers to ensure we create meaningful and human experiences that improve the health of our members.

The community of designers is vibrant and inclusive; we are all learning, growing, and improving together!

As a product designer, you will:

  • Develop a product vision and enable teams to explore, ideate, and experiment towards it. When required, you should be able to autonomously take product bets from zero to one.

  • Communicate transversally and be a compelling storyteller, employing written visual and verbal techniques.

  • Build an understanding of our members to nurture product thinking and transform insights into actionable opportunities.

  • Maintain strong working relationships and collaborate with product managers, researchers, and engineers, from identifying problems and opportunities to finding solutions and delivering the product(s).

  • Develop and evangelize design understanding and sensibility across the organization, improving ways of working and design processes.

  • Mentor junior designers, increasing collective performance and quality across the team.

  • Deliver a UI consistent with Alan’s brand with thoughtful design choices and a high-quality bar in delivering products.

  • Contribute to the design system with components documentation for designers and engineers.

  • Evaluate and maintain the quality of Alan’s product through continuous monitoring and testing.

✏️ Qualifications

  • 5+ years of product design experience - You've designed and built products from concept to launch

  • Track record of shipping quality products - You're experienced working within cross-functional product and engineering teams to deliver exceptional user experiences

  • Design mentorship experience - You've coached and guided junior designers, helping them grow their skills and careers

  • Full-stack design expertise - You have proven skills across UX research, UI design, and visual design, with the ability to deliver production-ready assets that developers can implement seamlessly

  • Embrace of AI and other innovative tools - You're curious about and experienced with leveraging AI-powered design tools and emerging technologies

  • Strong English communication - You're fluent in English and can collaborate effectively with our international team (French is a plus but not required)

🙌 Products you may work on

You'll be designing the direct touchpoints that connect our members with their healthcare journey. Your work will focus on:

  • Health Partner Experience: Design mobile and web interfaces that empower members to engage with our health services - from mental health support and back pain programs to Alan Clinic appointments and other wellness offerings

  • Mobile App: Create intuitive mobile experiences that help members easily access their healthcare benefits, track claims, find providers, and manage their health insurance needs

  • Alan’s Website: Design compelling web experiences that guide both prospective and existing members through their healthcare journey, from initial discovery to ongoing service usage

Each of these touchpoints plays a crucial role in making healthcare more accessible and user-friendly for our members.

For this role, we are aiming to hire within the C0-D level range.

🙌 Perks & Benefits

At Alan, we believe that being in good health is a basic need, and it starts with our employees. This is why Alaners are provided with a stimulating environment and perks ensuring they are happy, efficient and spend only high-quality time with co-workers.

Therefore, we offer:

  • Fair rewards. Generous equity packages complement your base salary, for permanent contracts only.

  • Flexible Office. Amazing office space at our HQ, sponsored co-working hubs or a full-remote experience with home office equipment sponsorship, we want you to live where you’re the happiest.

  • All the tools you need. Top of the range equipment: Macbook Pro, keyboard, laptop stand, monitor, and Bose noise-canceling headphones.

  • Flexible vacation policy and flexible working hours. Organize your time as you wish.

  • Delightful healthcare insurance: Extremely comprehensive health insurance - 100% for you and your children, 90-100% for partners depending on your country (permanent contracts only).

  • Transport. Country-specific commuter benefits.

  • Learning & Training opportunities. A highly flexible Training policy free books and budget to attend and speak at conferences if the opportunity arises.

  • Personal growth through coaching: At Alan, coaching isn't just a perk - ****it's core to who we are. Every Alaner is paired with a dedicated coach from day one, who helps maximize their impact, nurture engagement, and navigate Alan's values to develop their full potential. Learn more about our coaching culture.

  • Parental leave. Extended parental leave for all new parents, for permanent contracts only.

Important note: we hire people, not roles.

If you're excited about this opportunity but don't check every box, we'd love to hear from you. Everyone, no matter how underrepresented, should feel free to apply as it can only bring learnings or success.

If you identify yourself as a woman: Did you know that research shows women often apply only when meeting 100% of requirements?

Remember, this is just a guide, not a checklist. We'll be thrilled to receive your application!

🔖 Check out our About Alan and Career pages, as well as our Medium, blog and Glassdoor page for more info.
